story:
Short Summary

We at the Tufts University chapter of the Archimedes Project are a group of students interested in social entrepreneurship, improving access to clean water and sanitation, and fighting waterborne disease! As such we, sponsored by the Tufts Institute for Innovation, are planning an Ideation Lab, bringing together students and professionals to create business plans leveraging novel existing technologies to increase access to sanitation and combat waterborne disease in the peri-urban slum areas of Tamil Nadu, India.

The weekend of April 17-19, beginning at 6:00 PM on Friday the 17th and ending at 7:00 PM on Sunday the 19th, 30 undergraduate and graduate students spanning many disciplines, selected carefully from a larger applicant pool, will be placed into 6 interdisciplinary teams of 5 students each, working with professional mentors based in both India and the US spanning the worlds of business, NGOs, and academia to develop their business plans. At the end of the weekend, each team will pitch their idea to a panel of 5 judges, who in conjunction with an audience vote will help to select a winning idea.

The winning idea, conditional on its feasibility, will have the opportunity to be considered for co-founding with the Archimedes Project headquarters' personnel and spend the next year working with fellow students at the Tufts branch of the Archimedes Project and partners on the ground in Tamil Nadu to incubate and further develop the business plan, with the tentative goal of launching on the ground in Tamil Nadu by summer 2016.

Any funds raised will go a long way towards contributing conditional seed money for student entrepreneurs!

Please find out more about our program here: http://www.archimedesproject.com/tufts

What We Need & What You Get

  • We would like to provide seed money to get the winning idea of the Ideation Lab off the ground, conditional upon its feasibility.
  • We have received funds from Tufts to cover the operating expenses of the Ideation Lab, and have $250 left over to put towards this seed fund. 
  • As such, we would like to raise an additional $750 from this campaign to be able to provide $1,000 in conditional seed money to a winning idea.
  • This money will go towards covering the expenses the enterprise will incur during the incubation phase, including but not limited to procurement, hiring, consulting fees, conference travel, and related expenses. An itemized budget on exact expenditures anticipated by the enterprise will be available after the Ideation Lab ends on April 19th.
  • Funders will receive special recognition in literature provided to Ideation Lab participants, on our website, and in special thank-yous announced during the Ideation Lab.

The Impact

The peri-urban slum areas of Tamil Nadu, India suffer from a critical lack of access to essential sanitation services.  In India, 50.4% of urban households have access to improved sanitation. However, only 18.2% of India’s impoverished peri-urban slum households have such access. In the urban area of Chennai in the state of Tamil Nadu, only 19% of slum households and 38% of non-slum households have access to toilets, with similar patterns observed in other peri-urban slum areas of Tamil Nadu.  This trend leads to the spread of waterborne diarrheal diseases caused by a variety of waterborne pathogens, the most common of which are rotavirus, giardia, cryptosporidium, campylobacter, E. coli, norovirus, shigella, and V. cholerae. (UNICEF)  Coupled with the lack of access to quality healthcare, diarrheal diseases can quickly result in life-threatening illnesses, and have become endemic in large segments of the Indian population. They constitute a leading cause of death among the Indian population, killing about 375,000 people each year, the majority of which are children under 5, but are entirely preventable. (The Lancet) We believe that we can change this through an innovative business model developed from the Ideation Lab's unique intensive, interdisciplinary, and competitive, yet simultaneously collaborative process.

Risks & Challenges

Although we are excited to be working with students, we do acknowledge that students may run into some difficulties in ideating and rolling out their business plans as students are not experts in the issues we will be grappling with and are often pressed for time. To address this issue, if any seed funding is given to student entrepreneurs, it will be given incrementally. We will also have a qualified team of mentors in business, public health, and research in the US and on the ground in India helping students solve any problems they may face and set them on the right track with their business planning and roll out. Most importantly, the person who we will select to ultimately assume the responsibility of being the CEO of an enterprise we launch, who will work alongside students, mentors, consultants, and employees and partners on the ground, will need to be someone who is locally culturally and linguistically competent, has an entrepreneurial mindset, and is willing to commit to the enterprise full time for a number of years.

Contact Us 

Jordan Klein (Jordan.Klein@tufts.edu)
Josephine Ong (Josephine.Ong@tufts.edu)
Thomas Gibson (Thomas.Gibson@tufts.edu)

story:
There is nothing better than a hot meal in the great outdoors. But it's sometimes hard to combine those two. That's why we created the Revolver BBQ. It's a lightweight, fold-up rotisserie grill made from stainless steel that will last ages. Revolver BBQ can be used by putting it on a grill or anywhere else you have a fire. It’s quick and easy to set up and start roasting. Oh, and it fits in a backpack.

    

Ever feel limited to your backyard, or steps from your car because traditional rotisserie grill are just too heavy and dirty to take it with you? We did too, but not anymore! The Revolver BBQ can easily be taken to the beach, camping, tailgating, picnicking, biking, hiking, fishing, or anywhere you go! Take it wherever you imagine you could be roasting! And the easy spinning design will help you do the job, so you can enjoy more time with your friends and family.


Time to get personal! What to take Revolver BBQ experience to the max? Order one with a custom engraving. Looking for a present for fathers day? Or want to personalize that business present with your company name on it? Or maybe just one for yourself with your own name on? Great! Order personalized perk and we will ask what would you like to see engraved on the Revolver BBQ. Example below:

 Revolver BBQ in action


What you will get for your contribution


This is what you will find in the Revolver BBQ pack

FAQs
  • Do you provide a warranty? Yes, we provide a lifetime warranty!
  • What materials do you use? Revolver BBQ is made from high quality stainless steel that will last ages. It is heat resistant and withstand any conditions.
  • Will it fit on my grill? Revolver BBQ fits mostly all standard and bigger grills. Measurements: (18in x 16.5in) or (46cm x 42cm)
  • How do I choose the text I want to engrave? We will ask you what would you like to see engraved in the end of the campaign.
  • Do I need special skewers? No, basically any kind of skewers fits the Revolver BBQ.
  • Does the Revolver BBQ pack include skewers? No, but if you don't have them already just claim our 10$ Skewers perk and get them at a cost price!
  • How do I wash it? Just put it in a dishwasher or rinse with water after using.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a pledge, you can still help up by spreading the word about our campaign. Just click any of the share links at the top right of this page and share our campaign with your friends and family, or anyone you know who likes it low and slow! Thank you SO MUCH for supporting the Revolver BBQ!

story:
Help improve the lives of over 500 children that may be suffering with early signs of heart disease, childhood diabetes, obesity, and social discrimination. Empower them with MonkeyPlay: A physical literacy program that helps get children off to a healthy start in life.

If you read nothing else, please don’t stop before you read this!

 It is a harsh reality that many children enter primary school with up to four risk factors for heart disease: high blood pressure, high blood cholesterol, high levels of body fat and fatty streaks in the arteries. Worldwide over 42 million children under the age of 5 are considered overweight or obese. The World Health Organization considers childhood inactivity and obesity two of the most serious public health challenges of the century. If that isn’t shocking enough, physical inactivity is now 1 of the top 10 leading causes of death worldwide. More people die each year from living a sedentary life than they do from smoking. Seriously!

The kids love to carry their monkeys with them even while balancing.

Childhood inactivity and obesity are epidemics in nearly every corner of the world. They have profound, negative impacts on the physical and emotional health of children, their families, and society as a whole. While free play opportunities and physical activity bring a multitude of cognitive, social, and emotional health benefits to children, these are the very behaviors that have drastically declined in the past 25 years. Because of this, children now face life long risk factors that stem from inactivity and unhealthy behaviors.


Hi, my name is Ruth.

Two years ago I founded Hutan, a nonprofit public charity to help children who suffer from chronic illnesses like early heart disease and Type ll diabetes to live healthier lives. For thirty years I have been a personal trainer, educator and health coach. I have also dedicated much of my life to studying animal behavior for the purpose of understanding, protecting and helping to reduce human-wildlife conflict affecting endangered species. With the creation of Hutan I was able to blend these two very different career paths into one by developing a desperately needed activity program to help children start life on a healthy path. The program is called MonkeyPlay and it launched in the fall of 2015 reaching over 100 children. MonkeyPlay is about improving physical literacy, or “the ability, confidence and desire to be physically active for life.” The first goal is to reduce lifelong health issues that stem from overweight and inactivity, like Type II diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and many cancers. The secondary benefit: By using the animal as a powerful mediator of concepts, children learn to appreciate wildlife diversity, learn a multitude of scientific lessons from animal behavior to geography, and develop an understanding of the interconnected nature of wildlife to the environment. A healthy body, a healthy mind and a healthy planet are necessary to ensure a life of well being.

HUTAN is a registered 501(c)3, all contributions are tax deductible.

Up to this point I have funded the development of the program along with all the materials with my personal finances. I have not received any salary or financial compensation for MonkeyPlay. The program has been a huge success, children squeal with delight when it's MonkeyPlay day, and I am looking forward to continuing it in the coming years. The problem is that the daycares and schools who could benefit the most from the program cannot afford it. Presently, I charge about half the price of what a parent would pay for many common extracurricular activities. Even so, lower income areas cannot afford to participate, although children there suffer with health problems at far higher rates than in wealthier districts. I am raising money so that I may be able to bring the program to 5 selected daycares in these areas. I have developed a MonkeyPlay "kit" and training program so that each daycare will receive all the materials they need to run the program themselves. This involves 10 hours of training at each daycare, 5 manuals covering how to run the program, parent and child take home activities to help develop healthy habits in the home, physical literacy products like balance beams, tunnels, weave poles, cones and agility ladders, along with 8 beautiful full-color signs (2' x 5') of animals and their characteristic movements.  The money raised will be used to launch the program into these daycares and guide the children who attend them into healthy active lifestyles. The goal is lifelong chronic disease prevention. With these 5 daycares the program will reach over 500 children immediately! The sooner we reach our funding goal the sooner we can start making a difference, now, when children are young and need the guidance to shape their lives. For me this is a lifelong passion and I have put my heart into making it happen. This is the first time in my life I can honestly say, "I love my job." I can offer a huge thank you in advance, because this will allow me to continue what is so needed in the world today.  It is, however, in the lives of these children that your funds will truly make a difference.


What is MonkeyPlay?

MonkeyPlay was created by Hutan, a 501(c)(3) non-profit that develops healthy programs for kids. We create an incredibly exciting environment in order to motivate children to move so that they may develop the skills that help build self esteem, confidence and ability through action packed activities that are based on mimicry of animal behavior.  

Our goal is to raise funds to give this gift to over 500 children.


What exactly is physical literacy?

The Desire, Confidence and Ability to be physically active for life. Physical literacy is achievable by all. It involves the development of fundamental movement skills that permit a child to read their environment and make appropriate decisions, allowing them to move confidently and with control in a wide range of physical activity situations. It is the foundation of long-term participation and performance to the best of one’s ability.

•  Everyone’s physical literacy journey is unique

•  Physical literacy is relevant and valuable at all stages and ages of life

•  The concept embraces much more than physical competence.                                         It embodies motivation and commitment to be active.


What have we done so far?

I have been working over the last 18 months, 7 days a week to get the MonkeyPlay program up and running. I have not received any salary or financial compensation related to MonkeyPlay. We have reached over a 100 children with exciting results. We are working with University of Michigan researchers to test the results of the program in the hopes of securing additional funding so that MonkeyPlay and physical literacy become a part of every child’s critical developmental years.


What will we use the funds for?  

3 training manuals are included plus 2 activity booklets–one for parents and one for children.

The donations will apply directly to materials that include multiple manuals, beautiful signs featuring targeted animals and movements, agility products like balance beams, tunnels, agility ladders, climbing hilltops, and balance disks, as well as hand eye training objects such as rubber bugs, scarfs, and lady bug beach balls. Along with the products  we will put in the hours it takes to train each daycare and the educators to run the program so they may offer it to ALL students that attend their centers. Because we are training teachers and educators, the children who attend currently will benefit immediately from the program, but the best part is, so will hundreds of kids that attend in the years to follow! The goal is to help children develop the skills to live healthy lives now and throughout their lifetimes. In return for your contribution, we will give you all our thanks, and the products of ours which we are able to offer you, such as free “monkeys”, at home activities and fun promotional items.

 

A section from one of the  8 movement signs. Each sign is 2 feet x 5 feet.

Check out more photos on  facebook.com/playmonkeyplay 

The Impact.

In a world plagued by the harmful impact of sedentary lifestyles, the chances for children to develop physical confidence, ability and use their imagination are disappearing. By making the opportunity available to children to learn and develop in healthy ways we are providing them with tools to use for the rest of their lives.

For those less athletic kids, kids that have trouble with gross and fine motor skills, improved physical literacy has proven to help instill socialization, emotion recognition, communication, and self confidence.

Snap together balance beam and balance disks included for each daycare.

 

“Why a crowdfunding campaign?” 

As a community we have a responsibility to help children grow to their fullest potential and we want you to get involved from the very beginning. In addition to pursuing traditional forms of raising money, we want ensure that our community continues to play an active role in the overall health of our children. The community in which we live is our single greatest asset and our single greatest source of strength, and we want our community and our partners to feel included every step of the way. Hutan For World Health is setting our aim at changing the lives of 500 kids by providing a physical literacy program that is so critically needed. The MonkeyPlay campaign will help improve each child’s ability confidence and desire to be physically active for life.

Every child deserves the chance to benefit from having a healthy start in life. But social inequality deprives many kids of this privilege.  By implementing the MonkeyPlay program at low-income schools, together we will help 500 children begin life with the advantages that come from being physically literate.


A page from the children's activity booklet.

Exercise sounds like work. MonkeyPlay sounds like FUN!

During early childhood children learn through interaction with their environment. This is a unique period in the life span primarily due to the development of basic motor skills and daily learning experiences can have a significant influence on developing a positive attitude and appreciation for a lifetime of participation in regular healthful activity. Fun derived from involvement maximizes positive and minimizes negative experiences related to physical activity. The method behind MonkeyPlay is to promote and provide movement experiences that offer ALL children pleasure and at the same time help them to develop good habits with a focus on skill building appropriate for their abilities. Instructionally, MonkeyPlay movements incorporate well-known practices, derived from research, into a program that maximizes opportunities for learning and success for all children. MonkeyPlay offers learning experiences in movement that encompass and interface with many areas of development to encourage positive attitudes toward healthy lifestyles. With this in mind, the goal is to not emphasize sports and activities that selectively eliminate children who are less skilled but to teach the joy of movement through play, creativity and imagination.


How will the money be used?

Every child deserves the chance to develop a healthy life. But social inequality deprives many kids of this privilege.  By creating a program to assist low-income schools, MonkeyPlay will reach more than 500 children in need right away.

Your support of this campaign will allow us to bring our innovational program to more than 500 kids in the next year alone and to increase the scale to reach hundreds more in the coming decade.  Together we can continue to give children equal access to the healthy lifestyle habits. In addition to growing the number of schools we reach each year, we’re setting our sights on offering a lifetime of support. Any funds above our goal will go towards developing curriculum, launching additional movement programs, and even to build a MonkeyPlay center with an indoor outdoor climbing scape and innovative outdoor classrooms. With your help, these efforts will nourish, educate, and inspire hundreds more children.


Who is it the program for?

The program is designed for boys and girls aged 2-5, but even adults have been known to enjoy participating in the creative movements. We've spent a great deal of time working out the details of the program so that any kid — regardless of experience — can engage quickly and get the most out of the activities.

On the days when running a nonprofit feels overwhelming and shall I say “challenging”,  I think of these two quotes often:

We make a living by what we get,  

but we make a life by what we give.

–Winston Churchill

“You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem,

or a wrong that you want to right.

If you're not passionate enough from the start,

you'll never stick it out.”

–Steve Jobs 


Best ways to share this campaign are:

On Facebook. By far, our best tool for sharing this message is through Facebook. You can simply paste this URL http://igg.me/at/operation-monkeyplay/13169530 straight onto your page with a message!

On Twitter. You can also tweet out the video or this direct link - http://igg.me/at/operation-monkeyplay/13169530

A short email. Think about the people in your life that may benefit from this message (or might appreciate helping to spread the message). Write a short note to them in an email! We can reach far more people doing this together!

Old fashioned word-of-mouth. We don’t do this much anymore, but just talk with people in your lives about it! Few things beat a genuine, face-to-face conversation. :)

Again, any way you can help - big or small - is deeply appreciated! The more conversations we can start around this issue... the better lives children will have!


I truly believe we all want to improve the world a little. We want to do our part; it gives purpose to our lives and leaves us with a sense of gratification, if only for a moment, it lets us feel good about ourselves. I have created this campaign so that we can address a critical problem facing children across the globe. Taking the time to become aware of the epidemic of childhood obesity and donating whatever possible will feel good. But for 500 children it may make a lifetime of difference. The power of a community when it pulls together is amazing.  

Thank you!!!!
story_txt:
Help improve the lives of over 500 children
that may be suffering with early signs of heart disease, childhood diabetes, obesity, and
social discrimination. Empower them with MonkeyPlay: A physical literacy
program that helps get children off to a healthy start in life.
If you read nothing else, please don’t stop
before you read this! It is a harsh reality that many children enter primary school with up
to four risk factors for heart disease: high blood
pressure, high blood cholesterol, high levels of body fat and fatty streaks in
the arteries. Worldwide over 42 million children under the age of 5 are
considered overweight or obese. The World Health Organization considers
childhood inactivity and obesity two of the most serious public health
challenges of the century. If that isn’t shocking enough, physical inactivity
is now 1 of the top 10 leading causes of death worldwide. More people die each
year from living a sedentary life than they do from smoking. Seriously!
The kids love to carry their monkeys with them even while balancing.Childhood inactivity and obesity are
epidemics in nearly every corner of the world. They have profound, negative
impacts on the physical and emotional health of children, their families, and
society as a whole. While free play opportunities and physical activity bring a
multitude of cognitive, social, and emotional health benefits to children, these
are the very behaviors that have drastically declined in the past 25 years.
Because of this, children now face life long risk factors that stem from
inactivity and unhealthy behaviors.Hi, my name is Ruth.Two years ago I founded Hutan, a nonprofit
public charity to help children who suffer from chronic illnesses like early
heart disease and Type ll diabetes to live healthier lives. For thirty years I
have been a personal trainer, educator and health coach. I have also dedicated
much of my life to studying animal behavior for the purpose of understanding,
protecting and helping to reduce human-wildlife conflict affecting endangered
species. With the creation of Hutan I was able to blend these two very
different career paths into one by developing a desperately needed activity
program to help children start life on a healthy path. The program is called
MonkeyPlay and it launched in the fall of 2015 reaching over 100 children.
MonkeyPlay is about improving physical literacy, or “the ability, confidence and
desire to be physically active for life.” The first goal is to reduce lifelong
health issues that stem from overweight and inactivity, like Type II diabetes,
cardiovascular disease, and many cancers. The secondary benefit: By using the
animal as a powerful mediator of concepts, children learn to appreciate
wildlife diversity, learn a multitude of scientific lessons from animal
behavior to geography, and develop an understanding of the interconnected
nature of wildlife to the environment. A healthy body, a healthy mind and a
healthy planet are necessary to ensure a life of well being.
HUTAN is a registered 501(c)3, all
contributions are tax deductible.
Up to this point I have funded the
development of the program along with all the materials with my personal
finances. I have not received any salary or financial compensation for
MonkeyPlay. The program has been a huge success, children squeal with delight
when it's MonkeyPlay day, and I am looking forward to continuing it in the
coming years. The problem is that the daycares and schools who could benefit
the most from the program cannot afford it. Presently, I charge about half the
price of what a parent would pay for many common extracurricular activities.
Even so, lower income areas cannot afford to participate, although children
there suffer with health problems at far higher rates than in wealthier
districts. I am raising money so that I may be able to bring the program to 5
selected daycares in these areas. I have developed a MonkeyPlay "kit"
and training program so that each daycare will receive all the materials they
need to run the program themselves. This involves 10 hours of training at each
daycare, 5 manuals covering how to run the program, parent and child take home
activities to help develop healthy habits in the home, physical literacy
products like balance beams, tunnels, weave poles, cones and agility ladders,

characteristic movements.  The money raised will be used to launch the
program into these daycares and guide the children who attend them into healthy
active lifestyles. The goal is lifelong chronic disease prevention. With these
5 daycares the program will reach over 500 children immediately! The sooner we reach our
funding goal the sooner we can start making a difference, now, when children
are young and need the guidance to shape their lives. For me this is a lifelong
passion and I have put my heart into making it happen. This is the first time
in my life I can honestly say, "I love my job." I can offer a huge
thank you in advance, because this will allow me to continue what is so needed
in the world today.  It is, however, in the lives of these children that
your funds will truly make a difference.

story:
Company Introduction

Parkside Brewing Company was established in the Fall of 2015 by Paul Kay, Shaun Ryan, Andy Jameson, and Wade Lancaster.  Our goal is to bring high quality craft beer to Burlington, Iowa and the surrounding communities.  Paul and Shaun, whom each are award-winning home brewers, developed a passion for creating unique and flavorful brews that they have long-shared with their family and friends.  They met as members of the local home brewers club known as the Burlington M.O.B (Makers of Beer), and formed a friendship around their interest in brewing.  Andy and Wade are longtime friends of Paul, and each share a fondness for craft beer and the craft beer industry.  Paul introduced Shaun to Andy and Wade, and as they say, “the rest is history”.

A genuine passion for high quality beer and the opportunity to fulfill a need for fresh, high quality, locally brewed beer in the Burlington-area market has set the four of us on a path to produce, market, and serve the highest quality craft beer in the region.  Paul and Shawn will oversee operations at Parkside Brewing Company.  Andy will manage finances, and Wade will direct marketing and sales activities for the company.  We each bring different skill sets that will help set Parkside Brewing Company apart from other breweries and brew pubs.

Why Parkside Brewing Company?

Spending time outdoors and participating in outdoor recreational activities was an area each of the team members had in common.  It was only fitting that a nature-centered company name was something we were interested in.  Considering that our facility is directly west of two (2) public parks in Burlington, the name Parkside Brewing Company seemed perfect for our venture.  Dankwardt and Crapo Parks each sit just across Madison Avenue from our location.  The parks provide ample outdoor recreation opportunities throughout the year for residents and visitors, and both are bordered by the east-bank of the Mississippi River.  Our objective is be a community leader in the support of these parks and activities enjoyed within and around them.


The 18,000 sq. ft. facility where we are located opened as a bowling alley in the early 1940s, and later became a pool and banquet hall.  After an extensive renovation, Parkside Brewing Company plans to use approximately 10K sq. ft. of the facility for manufacturing, and another 5K sq. ft. as a brew pub and restaurant.

In addition to the highest quality craft beer, Parkside Brewing Company plans to offer artisan pizza, tapas, and appetizers in our brew pub.  Using spent grains from the beer manufacturing process, we plan to offer a unique food experience not readily found in the Burlington area today.

Our Mission Statement

Parkside Brewing Company is a craft beer brewery dedicated to making the finest beer and beer-based beverages in the Midwest.  Our primary focus is on brewing quality craft beer using award-winning recipes that include premium ingredients.  Our uncompromising standards and complete process control will allow Parkside Brewing Company to become the standard by which other craft breweries will be judged.

Why Crowdfunding?

We would like to invite YOU to share in the excitement and experience of opening an establishment that Burlington and SE Iowa can call its own.  With your loyalty and support, the dream of opening and sustaining Parkside Brewing Company will become a reality.  Your generous donation will be used to help acquire equipment to be used in the brew pub and allow us to expand our productive capacity.  Our primary objective for your donation is to support the purchase of two (2) serving vessels (tanks) for the brew pub.  This equipment will help us simplify the production process and will allow us to bring product for you to enjoy more quickly.

With your donation, we will be offering you a number of unique Parkside Brewing Company perks.  There are several donation levels with different perks at each of those levels.  We hope you will find that our gratitude for your gift is the biggest perk we can provide. 

In addition to helping fund much needed equipment, our plan is to donate up to 5% of contributions to a local charity.  Our commitment to charity and sustainability is something our team is very proud to share with you.

We VERY much appreciate any donation. We realize donations are made with your hard-earned money and are very grateful that you find our venture worthy of your consideration.  We promise to never forget those of you who supported us as we set out on this journey.  We hope to provide a family-like atmosphere with our patrons at the brewery and will strive to make sure each of you feel at home when you come to visit.  

Thank you kindly from the Parkside Brewing Company team!

story:
boxedrolls

         Boxedrolls is an aspiring start-up company which aims to provide a subscription-based approach to delivering everyday necessities, particularly, toilet paper. Its objective is to facilitate access to quality toilet paper at a fraction of the market rate.

Aside from having the product delivered at your doorstep and a flexible subscription*, boxedrolls stands out from the rest. We have more sheets per roll and will be more affordable.

Behind this project is a mother and housewife who is currently staying at home and believes you can still make a difference and an income even if it’s not traditional. If the project becomes successful, she hopes to make an impact by becoming an inspiration to empower the many housewives, househusbands, stay-at-home mothers and fathers everywhere, for that matter. She is currently taking care of a cute little boy who loves to run around the house while eating strawberries; and yes, going “No. 2”, hence the toilet paper solution. Eureka.

*Flexible subscription-- clients can decide on the number of rolls delivered and the frequency of delivery (monthly, quarterly, etc.). Further, clients can transfer or cancel subscriptions at any time. They can even give subscriptions as gifts (Free toilet paper for life, anyone?)  


The estimated cost to realize this project is $20,000.  This will cover initial costs for shipment from the manufacturer, packaging materials, and marketing. It will also include costs for licensing and trademark.

Funders will be entitled to credits that they may use for toilet paper and other future products as a thank you for the generosity and more importantly, so they can experience how this whole thing works, firsthand. They will be first ones to know should there be new products.

This project will be considered successful if there is 1,000 subscriptions acquired after three months of launching the service. We hope to establish good relations with the customers and increased awareness of the service. 



Impact

One might wonder, why purchase a subscription of toilet paper when I can always buy them at the nearest convenience store? But we ask, why not?  Toilet paper is one of the everyday necessities that is often overlooked. Since it is so essential most consumers would just pick either the cheapest brand or the brand they are most comfortable with and won’t give it much thought. Little by little the costs add up.

An average household spends $140/ year for a family of four** yearly for toilet paper alone. boxedrolls aims to introduce another option in the market where quality, cost, and convenience go hand in hand in hand. A 2-ply variant costs only $0.65 and a 3-ply variant costs $0.75, which is almost half the average price in stores. Since it is subscription based, clients will detail their normal consumption. An automated reminder will be sent to the client’s email address reminding them of upcoming shipments up to three months out. This all ensures subscribers won’t run out of toilet paper at the wrong time! 

The project seeks to provide convenience to meet the client’s personal needs but also to cater to their philanthropic causes. The founder has experienced firsthand how difficult it is to pay for toilet paper when the budget is tight. With the subscription, clients can gift a shelter, friends, or family members without buying anything directly. They can also remain anonymous or let them know you care with a sentimental message.



Risks

The most obvious challenge is to ensure that awareness of the project will translate into subscriptions. The founders have prepared marketing materials that will perk interest but to convince potential clients to commit. Registering is easy and convenient without all the small print.


While we will only know the exact numbers of pre-orders after the campaign, the blueprint for how future orders will be fulfilled has already been laid out.  Should there be any operational problems, they will be dealt with accordingly, without cutting any corners.


We are assuring any contributor that we will be dealing with the best manufacturers and that fast shipping is a priority. More importantly, you can count on us to do things right the first time, but remain available in the event of a problem.


Up for the Challenge

We have been preparing for this moment for quite some time now and we are now ready to get this project up and running to the max. We are excited to share this idea with the great minds of Indiegogo because we feel that it would benefit everyone!

We want to share this experience with you and we want nothing more than to help our clients be able to save on one of the few things needed daily in a household.

We already have the best manufacturer, so we will be able to deliver quality toilet paper for a fraction of the cost. 

We appreciate the time you taken to learn about us. Thank you in advance for helping. We will always remember where we started (the utility room of our house), and we will continue to provide excellent toilet paper and eventually roll out more products in the very near future. If this is our chance to make a little difference in this world we live in so be it, and we would happily do that—to be reminded to give back and to appreciate the simple necessities of life.

Thank you. 

trust.

Ava Cruzabra

boxedrolls         Boxedrolls is an aspiring start-up company which aims to provide a subscription-based approach to delivering everyday necessities, particularly, toilet paper. Its objective is to facilitate access to quality toilet paper at a fraction of the market rate.Aside from having the product delivered at your doorstep and a flexible subscription*, boxedrolls stands out from the rest. We have more sheets per roll and will be more affordable.Behind this project is a mother and housewife who is currently staying at home and believes you can still make a difference and an income even if it’s not traditional. If the project becomes successful, she hopes to make an impact by becoming an inspiration to empower the many housewives, househusbands, stay-at-home mothers and fathers everywhere, for that matter. She is currently taking care of a cute little boy who loves to run around the house while eating strawberries; and yes, going “No. 2”, hence the toilet paper solution. Eureka.*Flexible subscription-- clients can decide on the number of rolls delivered and the frequency of delivery (monthly, quarterly, etc.). Further, clients can transfer or cancel subscriptions at any time. They can even give subscriptions as gifts (Free toilet paper for life, anyone?)  
The estimated cost to realize this project is $20,000.  This will cover initial costs for shipment from the manufacturer, packaging materials, and marketing. It will also include costs for licensing and trademark.Funders will be entitled to credits that they may use for toilet paper and other future products as a thank you for the generosity and more importantly, so they can experience how this whole thing works, firsthand. story:
To read this project in english follow this link

To support this project in USD follow this link

Vous souhaitez contribuer au projet sans recevoir de contreparties cliquer içi

Canhe-Fit est un petit pendentif connecté qui s'attache au collier de l'animal pour indiquer, via une application mobile, la quantité de nourriture dont votre animal a besoin.

Par ailleurs, l'application vous permet de suivre la consommation alimentaire et l'activité de votre animal. L'application fonctionne également comme un GPS, utilisant une localisation sociale qui vous permet de retrouver facilement votre chien ou votre chat perdu.


PRESENTE

CANHE-FIT



LE PLUS PETIT OBJET CONNECTE POUR ANIMAUX DE COMPAGNIE, AVEC UN DESIGN FRANÇAIS



Changez son look au gré de vos envies en donnant un style tendance et coloré à votre animal. Canhegat a sélectionné cinq couleurs : rouge, cyan, orange, violet et noir. Notre version "Canhe-Fit classic pack" est accompagnée de deux couleurs : cyan et violet.


Connaissez-vous la quantité exacte de nourriture dont chacun a besoin ?

La quantité de nourriture doit être optimisé par rapport à la race de votre animal, son âge, son poids et son activité. 20% (au Japon) à 50% (aux Etats-Unis) des chats et des chiens sont obèses ou en surpoids dans le monde.

Maintenez leur poids, vous maintenez leur santé!

Une grande partie de la santé de votre animal découle de la manière dont vous le nourrissez. L'obésité (30% de surpoids) réduit de 2 ans l'espérance de vie des animaux de compagnie, et augmente les risques : de cancer, de maladie cardiaque, de diabète, d'arthrite et de mort prématurée. 

Savez vous quelle est la meilleure formule d'aliment pour eux?

Meilleur est l'aliment et plus belle sera leur vie. Avec plusieurs milliers de marques différentes, il est difficile de sélectionner la plus adaptée sans dépenser beaucoup d'argent dans un régime spécifique.


VU SUR



Les fonctions de Canhe-Fit

Alimentation. La croquette de trop? Canhe-Fit vous indique la quantité adaptée de nourriture à donner à votre animal de compagnie. Après avoir rempli le profil de votre animal et après avoir sélectionné la marque régulière d'aliments que vous lui donnez, notre application vous dira quelle quantité de nourriture lui distribuer par rapport à son poids, son âge, sa race et son activité.


Activité. Pacha, sportif ou explorateur ! Canhe-Fit vous donne la réponse. Notre pendentif accroché au collier enregistre l'activité de votre animal toute la journée. Dès que votre animal se rapproche de votre téléphone, toutes les données sont téléchargées, analysées par nos web-services et sauvegardées dans notre base de données.


Classement. Surveillez les animaux du quartier pour maintenir votre champion sur le podium! Pour ceux qui aime le challenge ou la compétition, nous avons développé un algorithme pour classer tous les animaux suivis selon leur activité mais aussi selon la manière dont vous prenez soin d'eux. 


Animal perdu. La communauté Canhegat va vous aider à retrouver votre meilleur ami. Si votre animal se perd, vous avez juste à presser le bouton "perdu" et toute la communauté sera mobilisé pour vous aider.


Surveillance Vétérinaire. Une page web dédiée est disponible pour votre vétérinaire. Il aura accès aux paramètres de notre formule de calcul pour les adapter de façon personnalisée à votre animal. En plus de cela il aura accès à tout l'historique d'activité et de nourrissage.


Spécifications Techniques


Notre Histoire

Nous sommes deux co-fondateurs de Canhegat, amoureux des animaux & fans de sciences et de nouvelles technologies. Au départ nous souhaitons surtout aider tous les amoureux des animaux, en leur apportant des indications claires et compréhensibles au travers de leur smartphone grâce à la puissance des dernières technologies.


Contreparties

N'hésitez pas à nous contacter sur contact@canhegat.com si vous souhaitez obtenir une contrepartie personnalisée


Objectifs à débloquer


ACCESSOIRES


Calendrier du Projet


RISQUES ET DÉFIS 

Nous avons déjà prévu de lancer Canhe-Fit peu importe le déroulement de la campagne de crowdfunding. Cependant, l'ensemble de vos contributions aura une influence sur la facilité avec laquelle nous allons pouvoir distribuer notre produit partout dans le monde et donner à chacun la chance de l'avoir. De plus, le montant global de cette campagne va nous permettre de savoir combien de personnes nous pourrons recruter pour maintenir notre base de données et développer de nouveaux produits pour le bien être animal et également pour celui de leurs maîtres.

grâce à VOTRE AIDE, nous allons créer une équipe d'expert pour vous aider à prendre soin de la nutrition de votre animal.


AUTRES MANIÈRES DE NOUS AIDER

Certains d'entre vous ne peuvent pas contribuer, mais cela ne veut pas dire que vous ne pouvez pas nous aider. Vous pouvez simplement nous dire ce que vous pensez de notre produit et nous donner vos retours, vos commentaires et vos suggestions car cela nous intéresse. Vous pouvez aussi parler de nous en utilisant les outils indiegogo de partage sur les réseaux sociaux, mais aussi en partageant notre page avec vos amis qui peuvent être intéressé par notre produit!


FAQ

Puis-je partager mon profil Canhe-Fit avec d'autres personnes?

Oui. Vous pouvez partager votre profil Canhe-fit avec autant de personnes que vous le désirez.

Puis-je utiliser plusieurs téléphones avec mon Canhe-Fit?

Oui. L'application est gratuite et vous pouvez accéder à votre compte sur plusieurs téléphones.

Combien de Canhe-Fit un smartphone peut-il suivre?

Vous pouvez contrôler jusqu'à 5 produits Canhe-Fit avec votre application.

Combien de temps dure la batterie?

Canhe-Fit a une autonomie d'au moins 8 mois sur une seule pile bouton(fournie).

Est-ce que Canhe-Fit est waterproof?

Oui.

Quelle est la portée de Canhe-Fit ?

Vous pouvez scanner un Canhe-Fit jusqu'à 100 mètres en champ libre. Cette distance peut-être réduite selon l'environnement. Néanmoins, du fait que chaque Canhe-Fit peut être suivi par le réseau Canhegat , vous pouvez virtuellement le suivre n'importe où. A chaque fois qu'un utilisateur sera proche d'un Canhe-Fit perdu, sa position pourra être mise à jour.

Quelle est la durée de vie de Canhe-Fit?

Canhe-Fit est très robuste. Il est conçu pour supporter tous types de chocs et d'impacts.

Est-ce que l'application Android et iPhone est gratuite?

Oui. C'est absolument gratuit et il n'y aura pas de coûts supplémentaires par la suite.

Quelle type de batterie Canhe-Fit utilise?

Canhe-Fit utilise une pile bouton CR1632.

Quels types de téléphones sont compatibles avec l'application Canhegat ?

Les téléphones sous iOS avec Bluetooth 4.0 et en version 8.0 ou supérieure, et les téléphones Android avec Bluetooth 4.0 et en version Android 4.3 ou supérieure. 

Comment cela se connecte à mon téléphone?

Canhe-Fit se connecte à votre téléphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.

Dans quels pays allez vous expédier?

Tous. Nous expédierons dans le monde entier


PARTENAIRES

si vous souhaitez diffuser vos publicités sur notre application, contactez-nous par e-mail à: contact@canhegat.com

story:
whzon.com - The Mission

To Build Social and Economic Network where people can socialize, work, buy, sell and trade goods. A place were the people will be rewarded for their contribution no matter how large or small!

Is it possible to build a social network that actually benefits the members… Where 99 percent of the profits to be had don’t end up in the hands of a few greedy share holders. I think yes, and to test it out I have created whzon.com

Whzon.com has all the tools to allow regular people like you and me to build an online society where everyone gets some benefit from the wealth it creates.

Here is how it works

Regular Members

Regular members are the consumers… but they also contribute with their likes and shares and posts so they are rewarded a small amount. Not a lot but it will be more then the big sites of today will afford them.

Content Providers

This group will earn more because they are willing to take the time to provide content that brings added value to the network. They will also able to take on assignments to improve the quality of information the site provides to its viewers.

City Tycoons

Tycoons are the entrepreneurs. They will look after site affairs at the city level they will work with local business to open online store fronts and purchase advertising on the site. They will also monitor content for each city ensuring a rich experience for the members as they travel from location to location on the site.

Management

IDirect.com Inc will provide the management team to deliver the required infrastructure to make sure the web servers and application software are performing.

Will it work? The seed has been planted let see what grows out of it! 

(Any funds raised here will go into  seeding the economy,  97% of which goes directly to the members)

Power  To The  People!

story:
HideoutLounge - my favourite space

No chance for prying eyes


"Simply chill out in peace, completely undisturbed: the HideoutLounge lets you look out but prevents people looking in. The slightly subdued sun and a light breeze have a cooling effect, creating a comfortable indoor climate, ideal for sunbathing or just relaxing."
- Ann-Sophie 




Take your place in your favourite space!

HideoutLounge is a private space for your garden, your balcony, or any of your favourite outdoor places. Let's see which fascinating features will make it your favourite space:


No looking in

The special fabric used for the HideoutLounge makes it impossible to look into the interior from outside. The observer sees the attractive HideoutLounge but cannot make out what is happening within. So you are completely undisturbed.

A lovely view from inside


The design of HideoutLounge enables you to look out from inside. You see everything that is going on around you. Enjoy your terrace, balcony, garden or the countryside unobserved from the surroundings.


Bright interior 

The fabric slightly softens the sunshine, resulting in a friendly interior that is ideal for sunbathing or getting tanned. The material even provides a low UV protection factor of 2 – 3 against the sun.

Feel-good climate

The exterior of the HideoutLounge acts as a windbreak but permits a comfortable and cooling breeze through. No annoying heating up and no access for irritating insects.


Simply try it out – you will love it.

The quickest way to get the HideoutLounge is to participate in this Indiegogo Campaign. Choose one of the three different models and pick a HideoutLounge perk at the all-time low campaign price. And then take your place in your new favourite space. 


High quality, special fabric, and a cool design

The fabric is weather-resistant and can simply be cleaned with water. It is UV-resistant and difficult to ignite. The HideoutLounge is easy to put up but stable. It does not weigh much and is therefore effortlessly moved by two people.

You can easily roll up the sides and you’re sitting in an arcade or pergola. Put down the sides and close them using the zip (from inside or outside) if you would prefer more privacy.


Great features: 

  1. Suffused with sunshine - Enjoy the sun in the HideoutLounge without being dazzled. 
  2. Easy assembly - a simple push-in system. No drilling or screws necessary.
  3. Weather-resistant - robust materials and easy to clean with water.
  4. Delivery - the HideoutLounge will be delivered to your house. 
  5. Recharge your batteries - next spring you will already be able to rejuvenate in your favourite space. 
  6. Enjoy your privacy - in your new HideoutLounge.

Get your HideoutLounge now!

You want to exploit the advantages of the HideoutLounge? Buy a perk in this campaing and enjoy a bonus of EUR 150 - 350 compared to the recommended retail price.


Choose your favourite HideoutLounge

HideoutLounge is available in three sizes: HideoutLounge Me is perfect for a chair and table or a lounger. Two narrow loungers fit in the HideoutLounge Us. HideoutLounge Friends is ideal for friends or the whole family.


HideoutLounge Me

Hideoutlounge Me is perfect for one or two chairs with a small table or a chair. (Picture similar.)

  • Width: 111cm
  • Length: 209cm
  • Height: 162cm
Pattern: blue sky, mocha brown/beige side panels
Material: aluminium frame, quality zippers, polymer fabric (polyester, PVC)
Included: rods, cords to bind entrance, eyelets on front, zippers

HideoutLounge Us

HideoutLounge Us fits two deckchairs. And it has a comfortable standing height of 2m. (Picture similar.)

  • Width: 141cm
  • Length: 209cm
  • Height: 204cm
Pattern: blue sky, mocha brown/white/red side panels
Material: aluminium frame, quality zippers, polymer fabric (polyester, PVC)
Included: rods, cords to bind entrance, eyelets on front, zippers

HideoutLounge Friends

HideoutLounge Friends is ideal for friends or the whole family. You can even stand upright, have fun together, or change clothes. (Picture similar.)

  • Width: 237cm
  • Length: 209cm
  • Height: 223cm
Pattern: blue sky, mocha brown/white side panels
Material: aluminium frame, quality zippers, polymer fabric (polyester, PVC)
Included: rods, cords to bind entrance, eyelets on front, zippers


Available from spring 2017

Place an order now and ensure your EUR 150-350 bonus! We only ship to German addresses. If you have no German residence you may consider using a forwarding service such as: mygermany.com or mailboxde.com.


Team

We, Beate, Manfred and Ann-Sophie, work for an innovation management company based in Stuttgart, Germany. We have successfully managed several innovations, some of our companies projects have won prizes, e.g. the European Satellite Navigtion Competition of the European Space Agency (ESA). Some are lighthouse projects funded by the German government (e.g. DriveBattery2015) or Europe’s Next Innovation Leaders Projects funded by the EU Commission.

HideoutLounge is something new for us, as life-style and garden furniture did not belong to our core competences. Still we are very eager to bring HideoutLounge to life.

The idea was born during small talk with colleagues. Many of us expose a lot of our private lives on Facebook or other social media. But at home we might want to have more privacy - especially outside on the balcony or in the garden ;-)

Soon, after discovering the fascinating properties of this new fabric, the fantasising became serious and we got captivated by the idea of bringing more privacy to the gardens of urban neighbourhoods (or not so urban ones) with nosy neighbours.

Hopefully you will all enjoy it just as much as we do.


How we will invest the money?

At the moment, we've built the prototypes as you can see from the pictures above. We are ready to ramp up, as we have used the time to connect with our suppliers. 

The only things missing are a few insights that you can give us. First of all, do you like what you see? How many HideoutLounge units should we manufacture at the beginning. So help us by buying the HideoutLounge perks, or reserving your HideoutLounge to secure the all-time low Indiegogo campaign price. 

Secondly, we are eager to get feedback. What would you like to change, what do you miss? Contact us so that we can improve the HideoutLounge even more.
story_txt:
HideoutLounge - my favourite space
No chance for prying eyes


"Simply chill out in peace, completely undisturbed: the HideoutLounge lets you look out but prevents people looking in. The slightly subdued sun and a light breeze have a cooling effect, creating a comfortable indoor climate, ideal for sunbathing or just relaxing." 
- Ann-Sophie 



Take your place in your favourite space!

HideoutLounge is a private space for your garden, your balcony, or any of your favourite outdoor places. Let's see which fascinating features will make it your favourite space:

No looking in



The special fabric used for the HideoutLounge makes it impossible to look into the interior from outside. The observer sees the attractive HideoutLounge but cannot make out what is happening within. So you are completely undisturbed.



A lovely view from inside







The design of HideoutLounge enables you to look out from inside. You see everything that is going on around you. Enjoy your terrace, balcony, garden or the countryside unobserved from the surroundings.

Bright interior 

The fabric slightly softens the sunshine, resulting in a friendly interior that is ideal for sunbathing or getting tanned. The material even provides a low UV protection factor of 2 – 3 against the sun.


Feel-good climate


The exterior of the HideoutLounge acts as a windbreak but permits a comfortable and cooling breeze through. No annoying heating up and no access for irritating insects.

Simply try it out – you will love it.
The quickest way to get the HideoutLounge is to participate in this Indiegogo Campaign. Choose one of the three different models and pick a HideoutLounge perk at the all-time low campaign price. And then take your place in your new favourite space. 



High quality, special fabric, and a cool design
The fabric is weather-resistant and can simply be cleaned with water. It is UV-resistant and difficult to ignite. The HideoutLounge is easy to put up but stable. It does not weigh much and is therefore effortlessly moved by two people.
You can easily roll up the sides and you’re sitting in an arcade or pergola. Put down the sides and close them using the zip (from inside or outside) if you would prefer more privacy.




Great features: 


Suffused with sunshine - Enjoy the sun in the HideoutLounge
without being dazzled. 
Easy assembly - a simple push-in system. No
drilling or screws necessary.
Weather-resistant - robust materials and
easy to clean with water.
Delivery - the HideoutLounge will be
delivered to your house. 
Recharge your batteries - next spring you will
already be able to rejuvenate in your favourite space. 

Enjoy your privacy - in your new HideoutLounge.


Get your HideoutLounge now!
You want to exploit the advantages of the HideoutLounge? Buy a perk in this campaing and enjoy a bonus of EUR 150 - 350 compared to the recommended
retail price.

story:
What

Every small business has a big story to tell. This is what we believe and why we have come up with an online magazine that features personal stories of startup founders - pretty much anyone starting their own business - with a story to tell.

Why 

There are two things we love most: hearing stories, and telling them. We want to build a publication that gives each startup founder an isolated, zoomed-in lens, to tell their unique stories and experiences - as a series of personal snapshots. We dig deep to get the full experience of each entrepreneur's journey to date of building a particular venture that he or she believes so passionately in. We love these stories, and we want to share them with you.

Oh and did we mention that we hate pop-up or in-article ads? Well we do. And we suspect you do too. So no pop-ups. Ever. 

How

So this is why we need your help. We want to continue building this publication, without falling into the vicious circle of being forced to pump in as many ads as possible just to stay afloat. We are calling for pledges totalling £8,734 or $13,101 to make sure this journey continues in 2016. This amount will allow us to produce approximately 109 startup founders' stories. That’s 6 months of content, with on average 18 interview articles per month. Give us more, and we will give you more - every additional penny will be used to fund more interviews and bring you more stories - an entire library free to access. With no in-article ads. 

Team

Sean

I moved to the UK back in 2004, where I graduated with a degree in Accounting and Finance, followed by a Masters in Marketing. I spent a few years working in the digital marketing field in London, before starting my own small digital marketing project - where the seed for Startup Empire was planted. I know the trials and tribulations of starting your own business - and I know that there are many more stories out there. And I want to share them with you.

Sally

Sally hails from sunny South Africa, and comes with a degree in English and Psychology from the University of Cape Town. Her official title is Editor in Chief and along with her creative spirit she also brings a practical element to the team - building the Startup Empire dream into something concrete. She spent a number of years managing and writing for small business websites, before becoming a full-time mum and part-time writer back in 2003, before joining the Empire team. Sally has found herself completely engrossed in the startup stories and believes wholly in this project, and hopes that you will too.

You

By getting involved and helping us continue with this project, you can become a part of the Startup Empire family. Our aim is to build a community that shares high quality inspirational stories and ideas. We want to acknowledge your contribution, no matter how small, because we believe that with your help we can truly make something of this. 

Every single person that sponsors us £1 - £20 will have his/her name being featured on our website’s Backers-Hall-of-Fame. Sponsoring between £21 to £60, you will receive platinum status - your name and photo, your personal or company website link and your message - great for your business and personal profile or digital footprint. But even if you can only afford £1, your name will still feature. Because every single dollar counts. So make yours count too.

http://www.startupempire.org/backers-hall-of-fame/

We will keep the page live for a lifetime - as you will become part of the reason Startup Empire continues to live and breathe.

We also offer Sponsorship content solution for business/corporate backers (please check out the Sponsorship Backers Perk details).

story:
We’re Patty & Dereck Stonefish, an Indigenous couple on a mission to fulfill our dream!

What’s our dream?

ASRW.

ASRW (Arming Sisters Reawakening Warriors) is our organization, which aims to re-empower & reawaken individuals - in-turn, building our communities stronger.

It takes individuals to better a community. Many Natives suffer from unresolved historical & generational trauma. This unresolved trauma leads to many health disparities in NDN Country.

For Example:

·  The average of death among Native men in North Dakota is 52 years, compared to 72 years of our Non-Native counterparts. (A 20 year difference! - & this is just one example across NDN Country.)

·  The 3rd leading cause of death for Native women? Murder.

·  Diabetes rates are 17.9% among Natives – compared to 2.5% of our Non-Native counterparts.

So…how do we improve?

We all have to do our part - & ASRW is our unique approach.

ASRW aims to re-empower & reawaken the mental, physical, spiritual, & emotional health of Indigenous communities through SELF-Defense.

We have a unique view, approach, & application of self-defense. Yes, we teach self-defense moves – however, the manner in which they are taught is quite different. First – we’ve redefined self-defense to SELF-Defense.

Meaning…

SELF-Defense:  Protecting the human elements of mental, physical, spiritual, & emotional health based on individual needs.

We also believe one of the best ways to begin healing the SELF is through physical action. Physical action has the ability to re-empower – empowerment an individual may have forgotten exists within. It’s not about violence on violence – we believe that’s counter productive. Instead, it’s reawakening the SELF to remember we are powerful beyond measure.

Utilizing two lifetimes worth of cultural experiences – internationally & throughout NDN Country. This combined with 12 years of teaching, & 16 years of martial arts & fitness application means we as ASRW can provide experience & evidence based curriculum.

In order to reach our communities properly, we need YOUR help getting on our feet!

Our goal of $8,000 will allow us the breathing room to develop proper plans of action & secure funding to deliver courses efficiently & effectively at a national level. This will also allow us to explore new opportunities to build local community.

Thank you for your time & support & we hope to see you in your community!

story:
Welcome to Simone's Kitchen!

Cooking balanced seasonal menus that use the highest quality of fresh, local and organic ingredients, we want to bring people together to connect with one another over cuisine driven by love and prove once and for all that really healthy food can be really creative and of course delicious!

Right now is your opportunity to be a part of this project. In doing so, you are helping us to offer the local and global community 3 beautifully renovated en suite bed and breakfast rooms, and 5 evenings per week a new style of dinning; food made with love that brings people together to be nourished and share our special 3-4 course menu of the day.

Our vision is also unique because we want to be more than a place serving good food. We want to create a collaborative kitchen that both trains new chefs and also employs these chefs on a free-lance basis. 

We want to train chefs that can prepare nourishing wholefood cuisine and be a place where you can taste the passion of different chefs within the guidelines of (made with love), plant-based, organic and balanced.

By acting now you have the opportunity to purchase goods and services at a substantial discount and help us to manifest Simone's Kitchen.

It is amazing to me that when you start a new project the amount of transformation that takes place in front of your eyes!  Starting out we had a very clear vision for Simone’s Kitchen.  The transformation process and watching a space come to life is like starting to create a new recipe.  Slowly you pull together all the necessary ingredients to start.  And of course renovations like cooking comes with a big mess!!! But as you clean up and refine your “recipe” your space comes alive.  As our space develops and evolves we are excited to share with you our final “Dish” …. Simone’s Kitchen…!!!

 

Cooking and bringing people together is my passion.  Preparing food that represents the season, is balanced and well prepared means the gathering or party is enhanced. 

There is nothing more inspiring than the coming together of friends and family and creating feasts of celebration. 

 

It is our vision at Simone’s Kitchen to not only serve delicious and healthy food, but to bring people together into community through food. Our “Supper Club Dinners"  offer a fixed menu of the day, in an environment of sharing, exchange, laughter, and joy.  We look forward to you joining us at our community table at Simone’s Kitchen…!!

 

There is no need for “Fast Food” anymore.  At Simone’s Kitchen, part of our mission is to provide healthy and delicious take away meals to support our community.  Meals no longer have to be limited, unhealthy, boring, and uninspiring food.  At Simone’s Kitchen our take away meals are designed to energize and nourish you so you can be the creative and inspired person at whatever you do. 

 

Help Us: we are not only looking to raise funds but also to spread the word about Simone’s Kitchen and B&B!

Please help spread our message by:

  • Sharing this campaign with friends
  • Jump on social media and ‘like’ and share our page
  • Sign up for our mailing list to stay in the loop 

Every thought counts and we appreciate each and every one of you for your support!

We believe in honesty and transparency, so above we have attempted listing the things we need your support for. As it goes with renovations, many things end up costing more than anticipated, but the above should be a good indication of what we need to finish installing our centre piece; the kitchen in Simone’s Kitchen!

Above you can see what we have already achieved in our pastry kitchen! We need your support to complete the transformation for the rest of the building.

For those who are able to support us financially, we want to thank you tangibly by offering valuable perks, such as:

  • Special Edition Recipe E-Books!
  • Dining Discounts to Simone’s Kitchen
  • Room Discounts on our B&B
  • And more you can see to the right of this page… 

And for those who support us through their love, sharing with friends and through social media outlets, we thank you, thank you, THANK YOU! 

Food made with love, high quality and simple ingredients to support community togetherness and to live happier and more fulfilling lives.

Please take the step now to purchase our goods and services at a discount and you will be helping to BRING THIS PROJECT TO LIFE!

 Become a part of bringing healthy food and healthy living to Antwerp.

So ACT NOW ! ! !

With love and gratitude,

Simone's Kitchen Team

story:
While in the kitchen making a smoothie one morning before a long day of work and business school classes, the idea of improving how we make smoothies came to our CEO, Skip Garrett. He thought there must be a way to make it more convenient and less wasteful AND help those less fortunate while doing so. After polling other smoothie lovers and doing some R&D in his kitchen, FreshStax was born.

The FreshStax Mission:

Our mission at FreshStax is to make fresh, healthy produce accessible to everyone. We do this by delivering 5-packs of ready-to-blend, organic, smoothie kits, along with everything else needed to make a smoothie, directly to people's door using a weekly subscription model, and donating the same fresh, organic produce to the Food Deserts of South Central LA each time we make a delivery. 

Our Mission Helps Solve TWO Problems:

 Here's How it Works:

A delivery to you results in a donation to the under served in the food deserts of South Central LA where fresh produce is not easily accessible.

Since launching in August 2015:

What Our Customers Think:

"Having the smoothies portioned out and ready to blend and go made me feel proud I was doing right by my body."

- Joni - Trainer and Health Enthusiast | Anaheim, CA

"I highly recommend to other busy parents and professionals who just need to zap, grab and go before running out the door."

- Greg - Fitness Design Group | Venice, CA

"I think you guys are awesome, customer service has always been top notch. We loved the convenience of FreshStax!"

- Jennifer - Actor/Director/Choreographer | Orange, CA

We're excited about this growth as it means our ability to achieve our mission is growing as well. 

We haven't achieved this growth alone, however. Our friends at the Dream Center helped us early on with preparing the smoothie kits and several World Class gyms in the Los Angeles area have helped us market our product. Also, some of the finest family farms in the Southern California region continue to supply us with fresh, organic produce that gives our smoothies the taste our customers truly love and value. 

We've also partnered with Groceryships to make our donation efforts to the Food Deserts of South Central LA truly impactful. 

Once a month we visit The Groceryships HQ in South Central LA, donate fresh organic produce and smoothie kits to their members and graduates and discuss the health benefits of regularly consuming fresh produce.

This empowerment and education is what FreshStax is all about and we are grateful to our partner at Groceryships for helping us work towards fulfilling our mission.

We believe we're ready to work towards shipping FreshStax outside of the LA area. To do so we'll need funds to

1. Expand Our Prep Kitchen

As we continue to grow, we'll need more space, more tools and more hands to help us continue making high quality FreshStax smoothie kits.

2. Co-Locate Our Founders 

Our team currently operates out of 3 time zones. We are excited to get the entire team under one roof, working together everyday to grow our mission and business.

3. Revamp Our eCommerce Platform

We want to offer our customers the ability to seamlessly manage their subscriptions and also offer them the option to customize their smoothie kits. A new, more powerful website will help us do this.

The Incentives:

For your contribution towards helping us achieve these goals, you'll receive some really awesome incentives. Check out some of the incentives below. 


FAQ:

What comes in a FreshStax delivery? 

Each FreshStax delivery comes with 5 premium, organic smoothie kits, boosts and milks to give you enough energy, nutrients and fuel to last throughout the week. 

Can I order more than one week's worth of Stax at a time?

Sure! In fact, it's actually better for your pockets if you do. You can select a 1, 2, 4, or 8 week subscription term and receive a price break the longer your term. 

Where and when do you deliver?

We currently deliver to Los Angeles on Sundays between 2 and 10pm. Want us in your city? Tell us where you are by emailing us .

How is the produce selected? The produce in each FreshStax smoothie kit is hand selected from farmers local to your area.  We use all organic produce that's full of the nutrients you need to sustain a healthy lifestyle. Best of all, our produce is always fresh and never frozen.

Is FreshStax active in the community?

Absolutely! Serving the community is one of our priorities. Our mission is to make fresh produce accessible to everyone by delivering 5-Packs of premium, organic locally-sourced smoothie kits to our customers and donating fresh produce to the underserved each time we make a delivery. This mission will help eliminate food deserts in South Central Los Angeles and make healthy eating and living a reality for everyone.

Which flavors will I receive? 
Each week a different combination of Stax will be delivered to your doorstep.  If you'd like to hand select which flavors you receive, contact us at contact@freshstax.com with your name and flavor preferences for each week!

Are the bottles environmentally friendly?

Yes! We use BPA-free, recyclable bottles that are safe for storing your smoothie kits and for using to drink your blended smoothies.

How often are the deliveries?

Deliveries are made every week at a location chosen by you.  Home?  Work?  Gym?  You decide! 

Do I need to be home to accept delivery?

We prefer to make hand-to-hand deliveries and interact with our customer, but if you are not home the delivery can still be made!

How long does a FreshStax last?

Each Stax will stay fresh and ready to blend for approximately 5 days in the refrigerator.  Remember, you can extend the life of your Stax by storing them in an even cooler temperature. 

Can I order extra boosts or milks? 

Not enough boosts or milks? Get more! Each FreshStax delivery is supplied with enough boosts and milks to make 5 outstanding smoothies. But there's nothing wrong with wanting more.  Click on The Shop to purchase more boosts and milks. 

What equipment do I need?

All you need is a blender!  Each FreshStax delivery comes with fresh, organic produce, boosts and milks.  Just open, blend, and enjoy. 

Can I purchase a subscription as a gift?

Of course!  Who wouldn't want to be surprised with a week's worth of organic smoothies! Each gift is only for a ONE time delivery and not a weekly subscription.

He thought there must be a way to make it more convenient and less wasteful AND help those less fortunate while doing so. After polling other smoothie lovers and doing some R&D in his kitchen, FreshStax was born. The FreshStax Mission:Our mission at FreshStax is to make fresh, healthy produce accessible to everyone. We do this by delivering 5-packs of ready-to-blend, organic, smoothie kits, along with everything else needed to make a smoothie, directly to people's door using a weekly subscription model, and donating the same fresh, organic produce to the Food Deserts of South Central LA each time we make a delivery. Our Mission Helps Solve TWO Problems:  Here's How it Works:

We loved the convenience of FreshStax!"- Jennifer - Actor/Director/Choreographer | Orange, CAWe're excited about this growth as it means our ability to achieve our mission is growing as well. We haven't achieved this growth alone, however. story:
Do you have a family member you love completely and would do anything for?

Sheila does, and it is her Aunt Marj, who has been a positive role model all  her life.

Aunt Marj left home in her late teens - to get away. She moved to the United States, never married, and does not have any children. She and Sheila have remained in close contact throughout Sheila's life.

Fast forward a few decades. After a long and stellar career with the Los Angeles County Children’s Services, Aunt Marj took her well deserved retirement. Then, a couple of years ago, Sheila began to notice that her beloved Aunt was struggling with her words and thoughts. The “forgetfulness” of aging was taking hold. This made Sheila sad and so a visit to LA/Pasadena was arranged in early 2014.

On January 5th this year, Sheila’s beloved step-son Scott was killed in a brutal vehicle crash in Michigan. Then two of her long-time friends passed away within days of each other, and a dog Sheila loved and cared for often had to be put down. Her grief was over-whelming.

Then, on February 4th Sheila’s beloved Aunt Marj had a slip and fall, and suffered a massive stroke. Her whole left side is paralyzed, and Sheila received news that her Aunt will require 24/7 care in a specialized retirement facility. Because Aunt Marj is now a US citizen, bringing her back to Canada would be cost prohibitive, and, she wants to stay in CA. Sheila has spent countless hours on the phone to California dealing with her Aunt’s health and financial matters. The problem is her Aunt never contracted a Power of Attorney, or had a Will drawn up. It was something she had always meant to do.

With Marj's permission, a lawyer has now been engaged and the legal papers are to be drawn up shortly, so Marj can direct her own care.

Sheila needs your help to get to Pasadena, find lodgings, rent a vehicle and begin the laborious process of sorting through her Aunt Marj's worldly goods and selling her vehicle. Marj named Sheila as next of kin when she entered hospital and Sheila is the one capable, and willing, to help Marj at this fragile time in her life.

Sheila herself is a kind and caring individual, and she is heartbroken over this turn of events in her Aunt’s life and circumstances. Sheila needs to get to Pasadena to help her Aunt with the rest of her life’s changes. Aunt Marj is elderly, and with a massive stroke who knows how much longer she will be with us. While a few friends are visiting and praying for Marj, she is all alone, 5,000 miles from her native home.

Will you help get Sheila to LA?

This IndieGoGo page has been set up in order to help her raise enough money to go  help her Aunt Marj.

Sheila has always been generous in helping others when they needed it and now we need to show her how much that is appreciated.

Please help her in whatever way you can. Your donations are greatly appreciated. Please be so kind as to share this page with those you know, to help Sheila get to Pasadena to help her beloved Aunt Marj.

THANK YOU!
