story:
2 DAYS LEFT! THIS IS YOUR FINAL CHANCE TO GET THE CHEAPEST WAY TO ROAM AT SUCH AMAZING RATES! 


●  Brief description of the campaign and why it's important to me.

Hi! I'm Anton Colton, Head of Marketing and Sales at Interfone. Today, I embark on a new exciting project - the ROAM LIKE HOME Interfone SIM Sticker!

As a frequent traveller, it was difficult communicating with colleagues around the world and providing real-time updates to key agencies and customers. I required constant connectivity via calls and data, especially in a constantly connected world It is frustrating that when overseas, we would have to cut down on the likes of Facebook, email or WhatsApp to lower data usage.

Though, the most frustrating part about being on the go is the inability to keep in touch with my colleagues, family and friends, especially when we are in different timezones. When you are halfway around the world and 15 hours apart, there is a small window where everyone is awake. Those important moments can be missed due to the prohibitive high cost of overseas calls and roaming data usage.

The existing options were extremely disappointing. First, I was frustrated with buying local SIM cards everywhere. While it was cheaper, it was not ideal to keep track of so many of them. Second, I couldn't keep my local number, having to always hope the recipient will answer my calls or not being able to log in to my apps. Third, paying for roaming was too expensive, many a times to return home to find a colossal bill waiting for me.

That's why Interfone launched the SIM sticker: A convenient, affordable, and game-changing 0.5mm sticker placed on any micro-SIM (Apple / Android) that retains your number when overseas that can drastically reduce international roaming charges!

It is the easiest way to stay connected. Save on roaming with Interfone's SIM Sticker. Never change your SIM card again! The sticker requires only a one-time installation and comes with an accompanying easy-to-use app to make calls or use the Internet.


 It'll connect you to the best local networks in almost 100 countries, when you make calls, texts or use data roaming with our high-quality and cost effective services.

Featured on the following media outlets:


My unique perks for the Interfone SIM Sticker

As contributors to the campaign, we would like to share a series of exciting perks to thank you for your help in getting me closer to our eventual goals. Along with the revolutionary Interfone SIM Sticker, we will be giving out DOUBLE OR MORE credits and Interfone branded travel accessories! The perks are as follows:

- Basic: USD $25 for USD $50 credit

Double the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to try out the service. Backers of this tier will also receive 2 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag and passport cover).

- Intermediate: USD $50 – USD $112.50 credit

2.25 times the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to take advantage of this exclusive deal on Indiegogo. Backers of this tier will also receive 2 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag and passport cover).

- Advanced: USD $100 - $250 credit

2.5 times the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to get maximum gains from the campaign. Backers of this tier will also receive 3 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag, passport cover, and inflatable pillow).

With your support, if we do get to exceed the funding goal, we will make sure that everyone gets extra rewards to immediately start saving money on your travels, enjoying your trips, and keep closer connection to those who matter.

After buying a perk, we will need the following details to personalise  the Interfone SIM Sticker:

  1. Go to the Campaign page, and click on the "Ask a question" link, located below my name (Anton Colton).
  2. Type your details in the field 

    - Mobile number

    - Country

    - Network

    - Mobile Phone Make/model

    - Email address

  3. Click 'Send Message' and see confirmation the message was sent.

INDIEGOGO IS THE ONLY PLATFORM WHERE ANYONE CAN GET THESE DEALS!

The magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve

Having researched and developed this technology over the last two years, we are now looking for public support to make it better. You are the key to setting off the next global revolution in mobile communications.

Besides getting an opportunity to make overseas calls and data cheaper, contributors to the campaign will also stress test our system. We have individually tested the SIM Sticker on SIM cards in 54 countries:

Argentina /Australia / Austria / Bahrain / Belgium / Brazil / Bulgaria / Canada / Chile / China / Cyprus / Czech Republic / Denmark / Dominican Republic / El Salvador / Estonia / Finland / France / Germany / Greece / Hong Kong / Hungary / India / Indonesia / Ireland / Israel / Italy / Japan / Korea / Latvia / Lithuania / Luxembourg / Malaysia / Mexico / Netherlands / New Zealand / Norway / Peru / Poland / Portugal / Puerto Rico / Romania / Russia / Singapore / Slovakia / Slovenia / South Africa / Spain / Sweden / Switzerland / Thailand / Turkey / United Kingdom / USA

With the SIM Sticker, we have been able to roam in almost 100 countries, now I need your help to try it at scale.

If we can get just 1,000 SIM stickers up and running at the end, we will have enough data to streamline the service even more. This will prove to the world that no one should just accept existing troublesome roaming solutions anymore. Together, the Interfone SIM sticker will have enough momentum to expand to even more countries to help more people stay connected.

The Impact

 Why my project is valuable to you and to the world.

Save up to 90% on roaming

With international roaming calls for as low as $0.50/min, you can reduce your roaming costs by up to 90%. Enjoy the same low rates when you make international calls from your home country.

Embedded SIM & number

With the Interfone Sim card, you can travel anywhere, call & surf the web with just one universal SIM!

Pay-per-Use

Pay only for what you use, with no monthly subscription, no minimum monthly usage or contract.

Convenience

Skip the hassle of purchasing local SIM card overseas or hold multiple SIM cards for different countries with just one Interfone chip.

Stay on your mobile plan

Enjoy the best of both worlds – your home operator for local calls and Interfone chip when abroad and for international calls.

Global Impact

The first step to changing the world, is to change oneself. More converts to Interfone SIM Sticker instead of the alternatives will lead to more people accepting the inevitable change towards technology that betters our travel experience.


What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $25,000USD in this campaign. It is quite an ambitious goal for us, though it is necessary considering the goal of disrupting local pre-paid SIM cards and more. The funds raised will be put towards marketing efforts to get the word out to a global audience. It will take considerable effort to convince frequent travellers to change their usual routines (i.e. overpaying for roaming). 

As the target audience is global, the bulk of the funds will be spent on online marketing. First, through search engine optimisation (SEO) to get a global audience who are searching keywords to visit our site. Second, will be spent on advertising on social media to get more viral sharing, if possible. Lastly, public relations will be needed to educate a wider audience on Interfone SIM Sticker's simpler alternative.


After receiving the Interfone SIM Sticker, there is a one-time Installation:



You’re almost ready to roam!

To set up your device, follow these steps before your flight:

1. DOWNLOAD THE MY INTERFONE APP


2. SWITCH TO ‘AWAY’ MODE

Sign in to the My Interfone App with your account details.


3. CHANGE YOUR MOBILE SETTINGS

To enable data roaming while you’re away, always remember to

(i)  Change your APN settings

(ii)  Enable your mobile data and data roaming

To do this, please follow these steps:

iOS:

> Mobile Data

> Enable Mobile Data

> Mobile Data Options

> Enable Data Roaming

> Select Mobile data Network

> Change APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive), leaving the username & password field empty.

Android:

> Settings

> Mobile Networks

> Access Point Names

> Add

> Change name and APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive)

4. ACTIVATE YOUR DATA ROAMING

To activate your data or buy a package in ‘AWAY’ mode, select ‘Activate Data’ on the My Interfone App.

·  If you have a Wi-Fi connection, follow the instructions on the App.

·  If you do not have a Wi-Fi connection, you’ll receive an SMS from us with step-by-step instructions on how to buy or activate your data package.

Alternatively you can activate your data or buy a package in ‘HOME’ mode before travelling. All you need to do is make sure that you have a data connection, and then remember to switch to ‘AWAY’ mode when travelling to enable data roaming and start using the package. 

5. REGISTER YOUR INTERFONE SIM STICKER

Click the link below and complete the registration process using the chip serial number located at the back of the Interfone SIM sticker card. The serial number starts 8160317xxxxxxx

https://my.interfone.com/signup-now


Where the funds go if I don't reach my entire goal

As this campaign is on a flexible funding scheme, even if we do not get to the goal, we will honour the perks as promised. The key goal of this crowdfunding campaign is to get SIM Stickers into your hands to help you out and help us be better. Increasing users of the SIM Sticker by 1, 100 or 999 will help me understand more about travellers and mobile call/data consumption to improve the product and service. I personally guarantee that there will be the best support for users regardless of funds raised.


My successful track record with projects like this

I personally have spent quite some time in the telecommunications industry so I am confident that our Interfone SIM Sticker works and with your help, will be successful. 

My previous corporate role was the Head of Campaigns at O2 in the UK. I led the launch of SMB Digital (Connected Devices), the largest campaign in the history of SMB. The campaign included TV, radio, online, social and PR. It was awarded the best global campaign by Microsoft and was a finalist in O2’s annual awards. I've been part of many great products before but nothing as revolutionary as this.


Risks & Challenges

Anything worth doing is never going to be easy. The biggest risk is that our technology is unable to scale as fast as the demand. We expect that many people be interested to give the Interfone SIM Sticker a try - the worry is that the volume exceeds our capabilities to service it.

Also, the biggest challenge is that people are too used to travelling the same way. Advanced technologies sometimes put people off as too avant-garde. Even after pointing out the benefits outweigh the costs, it often takes a giant push to get someone to change.


My qualities to overcome these hurdles

I have a great team behind me to ensure the technical aspects of the Interfone SIM Sticker are rock solid. Also, as a seasoned marketing professional, I see changing consumer behaviour as an exciting challenge.


My plan for solving these challenges

To prepare for the increase in traffic and requests, the team and I will be on standby around the clock. Our system is built with excess redundancy to handle major fluctuations in data usage.

As for consumer mindsets, we plan to keep communications open on social media channels. My team and I will be more than willing to openly address any concerns for all to see. I hope that the transparency coupled with the benefits and publicity will turn even the most cynical of doubters around.

For starters, here are our frequently asked questions at the end of this page. If you cannot find your answer, please email us at info@interfone.com and we’ll get back to you shortly.


Other Ways You Can Help

As mentioned earlier, Interfone SIM Sticker is currently available for SIM cards in 54 countries. I would only offer these goods where I'm confident of its optimal performance. Hence for all those who are not in those countries, you can get the Fundamental: USD $10 Rewards only

For those in countries that have not been tested for Home SIM usage, this fee will ensure they will be first to have the SIM sticker when Interfone has expanded into that market. Backers of this tier will receive 1 X Interfone branded travel accessory (luggage tag).

For everyone else, help the revolution when you Share, Share, and Share!

The more word-of-mouth we can get, the more people will accept the movement towards providing better communication tools like Interfone SIM Sticker. Remember to share this campaign with your colleagues, clients, family and friends. You can do so with the social media links through Indiegogo so more will able to directly access this page.


FAQs

GENERAL

+ How does my Interfone SIM Sticker work?

Your Interfone SIM Sticker functions similarly to your local SIM. You’ll be able to make and receive calls, send and receive SMS, and use data – just at a lower price than if you were to use your home operator.

All you need to do is stick the Interfone Global SIM Sticker onto the back of your local SIM card in a one-time installation. You won’t have to purchase an overseas SIM or use a dual SIM phone in countries with access to Interfone’s network anymore.

And, you’ll even retain your original number when making calls.

+ Do I have to buy a new Interfone SIM Sticker every time I travel?

No, the Interfone SIM Sticker has a one-time installation and you’ll be able to use it every time you travel abroad to a country that’s a part of our network.

+ My phone is SIM locked, will I be able to use my Interfone Global SIM Sticker?

No. Your operator will not allow the Interfone SIM Sticker to work if your phone is SIM locked.

+ Which phone models are compatible with the Interfone Global SIM Sticker?

The Interfone SIM Sticker is compatible with most smartphones, including the Apple iPhone & Android smartphone models.

However, the Interfone SIM Sticker is currently NOT compatible with any Blackberry device.

+ Which SIM cards are compatible with the Interfone SIM Sticker?

Your device must use a Micro or Nano SIM to be compatible.

+ How is the Interfone SIM Sticker different from purchasing a prepaid local SIM card while overseas?

You’ll be able to enjoy absolute convenience when you travel to multiple destinations with the Interfone SIM Sticker, see how:

-  One SIM for everything – you won’t need to purchase another SIM at your travel destination with Interfone coverage.

-  Retain your original number for both incoming and outgoing calls, unlike a prepaid local SIM.

-  Enjoy savings when you make and receive calls, send and receive SMS, and use data roaming.

SET-UP

+ What do I need to do before I travel? How do I activate my Interfone SIM Sticker?

For information on what to do before you travel and how to activate your Interfone SIM Sticker, watch our videos for a detailed walkthrough.

Always remember to enable your mobile data and data roaming on your phone to ensure that you’ll be able to use mobile data in ‘AWAY’ mode.

+ What do I need to do when I return home? How do I de-activate my Interfone SIM Sticker?

For information on what to do when you get home and how to deactivate your Interfone SIM Sticker, watch our videos for a detailed walkthrough.

+ How do I know if my Interfone SIM Sticker has been installed correctly?

When you have activated ‘AWAY’ mode through the My Interfone App, your device’s home screen will display:

“INTERFONE AWAY ON”

This means that your Interfone SIM Sticker has been detected and you’re now on roaming mode.

When you’re on ‘HOME’ mode, your device’s home screen will display:

“INTERFONE HOME ON”

+ Will my Interfone SIM Sticker interfere with my local operator’s service?

No. The Interfone SIM Sticker will not interfere with your local operator’s service and you’ll even be able to make outgoing international calls from our platform at cheaper rates.

+ When using my Interfone SIM Sticker, how do I know if my call has been connected?

When you make an international or roaming call, you will hear our “We Connect” tone. This indicates that your call has been connected via Interfone.

Occasionally, the “We Connect” tone will only be heard partially. This depends on the connection between Interfone and the local network and won’t impact on your call quality.

+ What should I do if I’m overseas and I'm not connected to the operator network?

If you have switched to ‘AWAY’ more and are not connected automatically to an operator network, please try to restart you device.

If you are still not automatically connected, please manually search for an available network under your phone’s carrier settings to connect to the 3G network.

If the problem persists, you can reach us at info@interfone.com

To activate your local service provider’s roaming services, please switch back to ‘HOME’ mode on the My Interfone App.

+ What do I do if my Interfone SIM Sticker doesn’t work while I’m roaming?

Do not remove your Interfone SIM Sticker if it does not work.

If your Interfone SIM Sticker does not work, connect to Wi-Fi and switch from ‘AWAY’ mode to ‘HOME’ mode on the My Interfone App and restart your phone.

If the problem persists, you can contact us at info@interfone.com

+ How can I track my usage?

You’ll be able to track your usage through the My Interfone App or the Interfone Portal where you can log in to view your call usage, manage your account credit and check the call rates.

You’ll also be able to top up your account balance if you are using a prepaid account.

To access the Interfone Portal, visit my.interfone.com

MAKING CALLS

+ How do I make a call?

WHILE AWAY

Just call as you normally would from your phone’s keypad. Simply dial the country code and your recipient’s number. No additional codes are required.

Before the call gets connected, you will hear a beep to confirm that the call is going through our network.

AT HOME

To make a call after installing the Interfone SIM Sticker, simply dial the country code and recipient’s number into your phone’s keypad as you would normally.

When you make international calls, there are no additional codes required and we’ll route them through the Interfone network to make sure you get the best rates.

+ I’m making a local call in Singapore, will this be through my operator or Interfone?

All your locals calls will still go through your local operator as normal.

We’ll only route your call through Interfone’s network when you dial an overseas number.

+ Will I receive calls on my home number when my Interfone SIM Sticker is activated?

You’ll receive calls to your home SIM through the Interfone SIM Sticker.

+ Will I receive calls on my home number when my Interfone SIM Sticker is activated?

Yes, you’ll receive calls made to your original number, and will be able to make outgoing calls through that number too.

All you need to do is dial as you would normally from your keypad.

+ How is the call quality?

When using our services, you will seldom experience any difference between our service and your home operator.

+ Are calls made using GSM or VOIP?

When using the Interfone SIM Sticker, the first leg of the call is a GSM connection.

Once the call reaches the Interfone network, we’ll convert the call to a VoIP call.

DATA ROAMING

+ Will I be connected to 3G or 4G network?

The network you connect to will be dependent on your destination country’s infrastructure, and your phone model.

+ I’m overseas, but I’m unable to connect to data. What should I do?

Check if mobile data and data roaming have been enabled on your device.

Some operators may switch it off by default and you will not be able to connect to data if so.

To enable data roaming and set up your APN settings, please follow these steps:

iOS:

> Mobile Data

> Enable Mobile Data

> Mobile Data Options

> Enable Data Roaming

> Select Mobile data Network

> Change APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive), leaving the username & password field empty.

Android:

> Settings

> Mobile Networks

> Access Point Names

> Add

> Change name and APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive)

+ Why do I need to set up call forwarding?

In order to receive calls as per usual when roaming, you will need to set up call forwarding before you travel. When call forwarding is done, the cost of receiving an incoming call will typically be significantly lower compared to your normal operator.

Call forwarding is automatically activated when you switch to ‘AWAY’ mode.

IMPORTANT:

If you do not activate call forward or activate it only after you arrive at your destination, you will still be able to receive incoming calls with Interfone’s low rates.

However, your home operator will recognise that you’re travelling – and all your incoming calls will be recognised as an international call, resulting in a higher incoming call rate charged by your operator compared to Interfone’s incoming call.

OTHERS

+ What are the payment methods?

We accept payment by MasterCard and Visa.

+ Is this product/service by Interfone legal?

Yes, it’s legal. Interfone is holding a SBO license from IDA in Singapore and we work with the best providers to provide you a fully legal service.

+ My company’s telecommunication expenses are on a reimbursement basis. What should the individual staff do?

Your individual employees can sign up for a personal account. They will be responsible for their personal usage and billing.

+ How long do the credits purchased through Indiegogo last for?

The amount paid for each tier of perks (Basic $25 / Intermediate $50 / Advanced $100) will be permanent. The additional credit given exclusively through this campaign ($25 for Basic / $62.50 for Intermediate / $150 for Advanced) will expire 6 months from expected delivery date.
story_txt:
2 DAYS LEFT! THIS IS YOUR FINAL CHANCE TO GET THE CHEAPEST WAY TO ROAM AT SUCH AMAZING RATES! 
● 
Brief description of the campaign and why it's important to me.

Hi! I'm Anton Colton, Head of Marketing and Sales at Interfone. Today, I embark on a new exciting project - the ROAM LIKE HOME Interfone SIM Sticker!As a frequent traveller, it was difficult communicating with
colleagues around the world and providing real-time updates to key agencies and
customers. I required constant connectivity via calls and data, especially in a
constantly connected world It is frustrating that when overseas, we would have
to cut down on the likes of Facebook, email or WhatsApp to lower data usage. 
Though, the most frustrating part about being on the go is
the inability to keep in touch with my colleagues, family and friends,
especially when we are in different timezones. When you are halfway around the
world and 15 hours apart, there is a small window where everyone is awake.
Those important moments can be missed due to the prohibitive high cost of
overseas calls and roaming data usage.
The existing options were extremely disappointing. First, I
was frustrated with buying local SIM cards everywhere. While it was cheaper, it
was not ideal to keep track of so many of them. Second, I couldn't keep my
local number, having to always hope the recipient will answer my calls or not
being able to log in to my apps. Third, paying for roaming was too expensive,
many a times to return home to find a colossal bill waiting for me. 
That's why Interfone launched the SIM sticker: A convenient,
affordable, and game-changing 0.5mm sticker placed on any micro-SIM (Apple /
Android) that retains your number when overseas that can drastically reduce
international roaming charges!It is the easiest way to stay connected. Save on roaming
with Interfone's SIM Sticker. Never change your SIM card again! The sticker
requires only a one-time installation and comes with an accompanying
easy-to-use app to make calls or use the Internet.
 It'll connect
you to the best local networks in almost 100 countries, when you make calls,
texts or use data roaming with our high-quality and cost effective services.Featured on the following media outlets:





My unique perks for the Interfone SIM Sticker
As contributors to the campaign, we would like to share a series of exciting perks to thank you for your help in getting me closer to our eventual goals. Along with the revolutionary Interfone SIM Sticker, we will be giving out DOUBLE OR MORE credits and Interfone branded travel accessories! The perks are as follows:
- Basic: USD $25 for USD $50 credit
Double the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to try out the service. Backers of this tier will also receive 2 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag and passport cover).
- Intermediate: USD $50 – USD $112.50 credit
2.25 times the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to take advantage of this exclusive deal on Indiegogo. Backers of this tier will also receive 2 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag and passport cover).
- Advanced: USD $100 - $250 credit
2.5 times the credit for those in Home SIM tested countries to get maximum gains from the campaign. Backers of this tier will also receive 3 X Interfone branded travel accessories (luggage tag, passport cover, and inflatable pillow).
With your support, if we do get to exceed the funding goal, we will make sure that everyone gets extra rewards to immediately start saving money on your travels, enjoying your trips, and keep closer connection to those who matter.
After buying a perk, we will need the following details to personalise  the Interfone SIM Sticker:


Go to the Campaign page, and click on the "Ask a question" link, located below my name (Anton Colton).
Type your details in the field - Mobile number
- Country
- Network
- Mobile Phone Make/model
- Email address

Click 'Send Message' and see confirmation the message was sent.

INDIEGOGO IS THE ONLY PLATFORM WHERE ANYONE CAN GET THESE DEALS!
The magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve


Having researched and developed this technology over the
last two years, we are now looking for public support to make it better. You
are the key to setting off the next global revolution in mobile communications.

Besides getting an opportunity to make overseas calls and
data cheaper, contributors to the campaign will also stress test our system. We
have individually tested the SIM Sticker on SIM cards in 54 countries:
Argentina /Australia / Austria / Bahrain / Belgium / Brazil / Bulgaria / Canada / Chile / China / Cyprus / Czech Republic / Denmark / Dominican Republic / El Salvador / Estonia / Finland / France / Germany / Greece / Hong Kong / Hungary / India / Indonesia / Ireland / Israel / Italy / Japan / Korea / Latvia / Lithuania / Luxembourg / Malaysia / Mexico / Netherlands / New Zealand / Norway / Peru / Poland / Portugal / Puerto Rico / Romania / Russia / Singapore / Slovakia / Slovenia / South Africa / Spain / Sweden / Switzerland / Thailand / Turkey / United Kingdom / USA

With the SIM Sticker, we have been able to roam in almost
100 countries, now I need your help to try it at scale. 
If we can get just 1,000 SIM stickers up and running at the
end, we will have enough data to streamline the service even more. This will
prove to the world that no one should just accept existing troublesome roaming
solutions anymore. Together, the Interfone SIM sticker will have enough momentum to expand to
even more countries to help more people stay connected.

The Impact
 Why my project is valuable to you and to the world.
Save up to 90% on roaming
With international roaming calls for as low as $0.50/min, you can reduce your roaming costs by up to 90%. Enjoy the same low rates when you make international calls from your home country.
Embedded SIM & number
With the Interfone Sim card, you can travel anywhere, call & surf the web with just one universal SIM!
Pay-per-Use
Pay only for what you use, with no monthly subscription, no minimum monthly usage or contract.
Convenience
Skip the hassle of purchasing local SIM card overseas or hold multiple SIM cards for different countries with just one Interfone chip.
Stay on your mobile plan
Enjoy the best of both worlds – your home operator for local calls and Interfone chip when abroad and for international calls.
Global Impact
The first step to changing the world, is to change oneself. More converts to Interfone SIM Sticker instead of the alternatives will lead to more people accepting the inevitable change towards technology that betters our travel experience.

What We Need & What You Get




We are hoping to raise $25,000USD in this campaign. It is
quite an ambitious goal for us, though it is necessary considering the goal of
disrupting local pre-paid SIM cards and more. The funds raised will be put
towards marketing efforts to get the word out to a global audience. It will
take considerable effort to convince frequent travellers to change their usual
routines (i.e. overpaying for roaming). 
As the target audience is global, the
bulk of the funds will be spent on online marketing. First, through search
engine optimisation (SEO) to get a global audience who are searching keywords
to visit our site. Second, will be spent on advertising on social media to get
more viral sharing, if possible. Lastly, public relations will be needed to
educate a wider audience on Interfone SIM Sticker's simpler alternative.






After receiving the Interfone SIM Sticker, there is a one-time Installation:



You’re almost ready to roam!
To set up your device, follow these steps before your flight:
1. DOWNLOAD THE MY INTERFONE APP


2. SWITCH TO ‘AWAY’ MODE

Sign in to the My Interfone App with your account details.

3. CHANGE YOUR MOBILE SETTINGS
To enable data roaming while you’re away, always remember to
(i)  Change your APN settings 
(ii)  Enable your mobile data and data roaming 
To do this, please follow these steps:
iOS:
> Mobile Data
> Enable Mobile Data
> Mobile Data Options
> Enable Data Roaming
> Select Mobile data Network
> Change APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive), leaving the username & password field empty.
Android:
> Settings
> Mobile Networks
> Access Point Names
> Add
> Change name and APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive)
4. ACTIVATE YOUR DATA ROAMING
To activate your data or buy a package in ‘AWAY’ mode, select ‘Activate Data’ on the My Interfone App. 
·  If you have a Wi-Fi connection, follow the instructions on the App.
·  If you do not have a Wi-Fi connection, you’ll receive an SMS from us with step-by-step instructions on how to buy or activate your data package.
Alternatively you can activate your data or buy a package in ‘HOME’ mode before travelling. All you need to do is make sure that you have a data connection, and then remember to switch to ‘AWAY’ mode when travelling to enable data roaming and start using the package. 
5. REGISTER YOUR INTERFONE SIM STICKER
Click the link below and complete the registration process using the chip serial number located at the back of the Interfone SIM sticker card. The serial number starts 8160317xxxxxxx
https://my.interfone.com/signup-now
Where the funds go if I don't reach my entire goal


As this campaign is on a flexible funding
scheme, even if we do not get to the goal, we will honour the perks as
promised. The key goal of this crowdfunding campaign is to get SIM Stickers
into your hands to help you out and help us be better. Increasing users of the
SIM Sticker by 1, 100 or 999 will help me understand more about travellers and
mobile call/data consumption to improve the product and service. I personally
guarantee that there will be the best support for users regardless of funds
raised.

My successful track record with projects like this



I personally have spent quite some time in the
telecommunications industry so I am confident that our Interfone SIM Sticker
works and with your help, will be successful. 
My previous corporate role was
the Head of Campaigns at O2 in the UK. I led the launch of SMB Digital
(Connected Devices), the largest campaign in the history of SMB. The campaign
included TV, radio, online, social and PR. It was awarded the best global
campaign by Microsoft and was a finalist in O2’s annual awards. I've been part
of many great products before but nothing as revolutionary as this.


Risks & Challenges


Anything worth doing is never going to be easy. The biggest
risk is that our technology is unable to scale as fast as the demand. We expect
that many people be interested to give the Interfone SIM Sticker a try - the
worry is that the volume exceeds our capabilities to service it.
Also, the biggest challenge is that people are too used to
travelling the same way. Advanced technologies sometimes put people off as too
avant-garde. Even after pointing out the benefits outweigh the costs, it often
takes a giant push to get someone to change.



My qualities to overcome these hurdles




I have a great team behind me to ensure the technical
aspects of the Interfone SIM Sticker are rock solid. Also, as a seasoned
marketing professional, I see changing consumer behaviour as an exciting
challenge.

My plan for solving these challenges



To prepare for the increase in traffic and requests, the team
and I will be on standby around the clock. Our system is built with excess
redundancy to handle major fluctuations in data usage.
As for consumer mindsets, we plan to keep
communications open on social media channels. My team and I will be more than
willing to openly address any concerns for all to see. I hope that the
transparency coupled with the benefits and publicity will turn even the most
cynical of doubters around.


For starters, here are our frequently asked questions at the
end of this page. If you cannot find your answer, please email us at
info@interfone.com and we’ll get back to you shortly.

Other Ways You Can Help


As mentioned earlier, Interfone SIM Sticker is currently
available for SIM cards in 54 countries. I would only offer these goods where
I'm confident of its optimal performance. Hence for all those who are not in
those countries, you can get the Fundamental: USD $10 Rewards only
For those in countries that have not been tested for Home
SIM usage, this fee will ensure they will be first to have the SIM sticker when
Interfone has expanded into that market. Backers of this tier will receive 1 X
Interfone branded travel accessory (luggage tag). 
For everyone else, help the revolution when you Share,
Share, and Share!
The more word-of-mouth we can get, the more people will
accept the movement towards providing better communication tools like Interfone
SIM Sticker. Remember to share this campaign with your colleagues, clients,
family and friends. You can do so with the social media links through Indiegogo
so more will able to directly access this page.




FAQs 
GENERAL
+ How does my Interfone SIM Sticker work?
Your Interfone SIM Sticker functions similarly
to your local SIM. You’ll be able to make and receive calls, send and receive
SMS, and use data – just at a lower price than if you were to use your home
operator.
All you need to do is stick the Interfone
Global SIM Sticker onto the back of your local SIM card in a one-time
installation. You won’t have to purchase an overseas SIM or use a dual SIM
phone in countries with access to Interfone’s network anymore.
And, you’ll even retain your original number
when making calls.
+ Do I have to buy a new Interfone SIM Sticker
every time I travel?
No, the Interfone SIM Sticker has a one-time
installation and you’ll be able to use it every time you travel abroad to a
country that’s a part of our network.
+ My phone is SIM locked, will I be able to use
my Interfone Global SIM Sticker?
No. Your operator will not allow the Interfone
SIM Sticker to work if your phone is SIM locked.
+ Which phone models are compatible with the
Interfone Global SIM Sticker?
The Interfone SIM Sticker is compatible with
most smartphones, including the Apple iPhone & Android smartphone models.
However, the Interfone SIM Sticker is currently
NOT compatible with any Blackberry device.
+ Which SIM cards are compatible with the
Interfone SIM Sticker?
Your device must use a Micro or Nano SIM to be
compatible.
+ How is the Interfone SIM Sticker different
from purchasing a prepaid local SIM card while overseas?
You’ll be able to enjoy absolute convenience
when you travel to multiple destinations with the Interfone SIM Sticker, see
how:
- 
One SIM for everything – you won’t need to purchase another SIM at your
travel destination with Interfone coverage.
- 
Retain your original number for both incoming and outgoing calls, unlike
a prepaid local SIM.
- 
Enjoy savings when you make and receive calls, send and receive SMS, and
use data roaming.
SET-UP
+ What do I need to do before I travel? How do
I activate my Interfone SIM Sticker?
For information on what to do before you travel
and how to activate your Interfone SIM Sticker, watch our videos for a detailed
walkthrough.
Always remember to enable your mobile data and
data roaming on your phone to ensure that you’ll be able to use mobile data in
‘AWAY’ mode.
+ What do I need to do when I return home? How
do I de-activate my Interfone SIM Sticker?
For information on what to do when you get home
and how to deactivate your Interfone SIM Sticker, watch our videos for a
detailed walkthrough.
+ How do I know if my Interfone SIM Sticker has
been installed correctly?
When you have activated ‘AWAY’ mode through the
My Interfone App, your device’s home screen will display:
“INTERFONE AWAY ON”
This means that your Interfone SIM Sticker has
been detected and you’re now on roaming mode.
When you’re on ‘HOME’ mode, your device’s home
screen will display:
“INTERFONE HOME ON”
+ Will my Interfone SIM Sticker interfere with
my local operator’s service?
No. The Interfone SIM Sticker will not
interfere with your local operator’s service and you’ll even be able to make
outgoing international calls from our platform at cheaper rates.
+ When using my Interfone SIM Sticker, how do I
know if my call has been connected?
When you make an international or roaming call,
you will hear our “We Connect” tone. This indicates that your call has been
connected via Interfone.
Occasionally, the “We Connect” tone will only
be heard partially. This depends on the connection between Interfone and the
local network and won’t impact on your call quality.
+ What should I do if I’m overseas and I'm not
connected to the operator network?
If you have switched to ‘AWAY’ more and are not
connected automatically to an operator network, please try to restart you
device.
If you are still not automatically connected,
please manually search for an available network under your phone’s carrier settings
to connect to the 3G network.
If the problem persists, you can reach us at
info@interfone.com
To activate your local service provider’s
roaming services, please switch back to ‘HOME’ mode on the My Interfone App.
+ What do I do if my Interfone SIM Sticker
doesn’t work while I’m roaming?
Do not remove your Interfone SIM Sticker if it
does not work.
If your Interfone SIM Sticker does not work,
connect to Wi-Fi and switch from ‘AWAY’ mode to ‘HOME’ mode on the My Interfone
App and restart your phone.
If the problem persists, you can contact us at info@interfone.com
+ How can I track my usage?
You’ll be able to track your usage through the
My Interfone App or the Interfone Portal where you can log in to view your call
usage, manage your account credit and check the call rates.
You’ll also be able to top up your account
balance if you are using a prepaid account.
To access the Interfone Portal, visit
my.interfone.com
MAKING
CALLS
+ How do I make a call?
WHILE AWAY
Just call as you normally would from your
phone’s keypad. Simply dial the country code and your recipient’s number. No
additional codes are required.
Before the call gets connected, you will hear a
beep to confirm that the call is going through our network.
AT HOME
To make a call after installing the Interfone
SIM Sticker, simply dial the country code and recipient’s number into your
phone’s keypad as you would normally.
When you make international calls, there are no
additional codes required and we’ll route them through the Interfone network to
make sure you get the best rates.
+ I’m making a local call in Singapore, will
this be through my operator or Interfone?
All your locals calls will still go through
your local operator as normal.
We’ll only route your call through Interfone’s
network when you dial an overseas number.
+ Will I receive calls on my home number when
my Interfone SIM Sticker is activated?
You’ll receive calls to your home SIM through
the Interfone SIM Sticker.
+ Will I receive calls on my home number when
my Interfone SIM Sticker is activated?
Yes, you’ll receive calls made to your original
number, and will be able to make outgoing calls through that number too.
All you need to do is dial as you would
normally from your keypad.
+ How is the call quality?
When using our services, you will seldom
experience any difference between our service and your home operator.

+ Are calls made using GSM or VOIP?
When using the Interfone SIM Sticker, the first
leg of the call is a GSM connection.
Once the call reaches the Interfone network,
we’ll convert the call to a VoIP call.
DATA
ROAMING
+ Will I be connected to 3G or 4G network?
The network you connect to will be dependent on
your destination country’s infrastructure, and your phone model.
+ I’m overseas, but I’m unable to connect to
data. What should I do?
Check if mobile data and data roaming have been
enabled on your device.
Some operators may switch it off by default and
you will not be able to connect to data if so.
To enable data roaming and set up your APN
settings, please follow these steps:
iOS:
> Mobile Data
> Enable Mobile Data
> Mobile Data Options
> Enable Data Roaming
> Select Mobile data Network
> Change APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive), leaving the username & password
field empty.
Android:
> Settings
> Mobile Networks
> Access Point Names
> Add
> Change name and APN to <Interfone> (case sensitive)
+ Why do I need to set up call forwarding?
In order to receive calls as per usual when
roaming, you will need to set up call forwarding before you travel. When call
forwarding is done, the cost of receiving an incoming call will typically be
significantly lower compared to your normal operator.
Call forwarding is automatically activated when
you switch to ‘AWAY’ mode.
IMPORTANT:
If you do not activate call forward or activate
it only after you arrive at your destination, you will still be able to receive
incoming calls with Interfone’s low rates.
However, your home operator will recognise that
you’re travelling – and all your incoming calls will be recognised as an
international call, resulting in a higher incoming call rate charged by your
operator compared to Interfone’s incoming call.
OTHERS
+ What are the payment methods?
We accept payment by MasterCard and Visa.
+ Is this product/service by Interfone legal?
Yes, it’s legal. Interfone is holding a SBO
license from IDA in Singapore and we work with the best providers to provide
you a fully legal service.
+ My company’s telecommunication expenses are
on a reimbursement basis. What should the individual staff do?
Your individual employees can sign up for a
personal account. They will be responsible for their personal usage and
billing.

+ How long do the credits purchased through Indiegogo last for?
The amount paid for each tier of perks (Basic $25 / Intermediate $50 / Advanced $100) will be permanent. The additional credit given exclusively through this campaign ($25 for Basic / $62.50 for Intermediate / $150 for Advanced) will expire 6 months from expected delivery date.

story:
THE (QUICK) BACKSTORY

Since immigrating in the 1980s from India, I increasingly felt the importance of raising our community’s awareness and acceptance of all cultures.  I started the 4-H Indian Langoor Club in 1996 to teach youth about India in an environment that was closely connected with other important aspects of youth development - leadership, citizenship, and community service. I founded Enjoy Explore India (EEI) in 2009 to expand my outreach in the community. This innovative, hands-on education and enrichment program began to focus on sharing India’s culture and traditions in libraries, schools, and community gatherings. Since its founding, EEI has offered more than 250 workshops and events in New Jersey to build strong cultural connections. 

​And now, we are very excited for EEI to go global by creating a large-scale community-building event series to share cultures and find common ground.

THE EVENT

In October, EEI will be hosting the Festival of Lights at 4 malls across New Jersey. The Festival of Lights will showcase the dynamic spirit of the Indian Diasporas around the world, taking its inspiration from the widely celebrated Indian festival of Diwali.

Our greater goal, however, is to bring the community together around the universal symbol of light. The symbol of light is shared by all cultures around the world to represent freedom, optimism, and creativity.

In that spirit, we are designing an environment that bridges diverse cultures. Imagine a christmas tree surrounded by Indian Rangolis, a fireplace with Hanukiah candles and Diwali lamps, and a variety of cross-cultural holiday decorations... we cannot wait for you to explore!

The festival space is also being set up to recreate spaces that bring us together - country fairs, cozy family rooms, and of course, sumptuous dining tables laden with tasty foods! Here's a preview of what's to come:

​

Festival of Lights will offer a range of exciting community-building activities and performances. These fun activities include:

Mehendi Art (Henna)

Photobooth

Cooking Demos

Sari Styling

Rangoli Demonstrations

Traditional Storytelling

Music & Dance

Pageants, Fashion Shows and more! 

A unique lighting ceremony planned is sure to leave all attending the festival with an unforgettable and memorable experience.

With cumulative mall traffic estimated at more than 200,000 people during the four event days, this international gathering will offer the opportunity to experience the Festival of Lights, Diwali, in a multicultural way.

THE IMPORTANCE OF YOUR SUPPORT

EEI is a small team with BIG ideas! To bring these big ideas to life we need your support. With you and the community backing us, we feel evermore empowered to create an extraordinary cultural experience that’s free and open to the public.

While we have have set a goal of $10,000, this production will cost much more! We hope a mix of your backing, corporate sponsors, and EEI investment will help us pull it off! The more we raise through Indiegogo, the more grass roots this event will be.

Here's the breakdown of our budget:

One of our biggest expenses, but most exciting opportunities, is our Holiday Shop. The event’s holiday shop will showcase works by folk artists, highlight cottage industries, and local businesses dedicated to preserving and promoting the arts. The more we raise through our campaign, the more traditional artists and their art we can support!

So, as we begin executing our plan, we ask for your support in delivering an event that is meaningful, creative and engaging. We believe together as a community we can build an experience and a following that transcends the event itself.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

You could be anywhere in the world and still participate in bringing the Festival of Lights to life. Even if you cannot physically attend the events or contribute, join us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and visit our event website to see how the event is unfolding. Please spread the word by sharing our campaign with your friends and family, neighbors, co-workers and others in your community… thank you! 

To learn more about EEI or connect with us as a partner, call us at 732-645-2274, email us at connect@enjoyexploreindia.com, or visit our company website. We love exchanging ideas and building cultural connections!

FESTIVAL DATES AND LOCATIONS

These fun activities include:Mehendi Art (Henna)PhotoboothCooking DemosSari StylingRangoli DemonstrationsTraditional StorytellingMusic & DancePageants, Fashion Shows and more! A unique lighting ceremony planned is sure to leave all attending the festival with an unforgettable and memorable experience.With cumulative mall traffic estimated at more than 200,000 people during the four event days, this international gathering will offer the opportunity to experience the Festival of Lights, Diwali, in a multicultural way.THE IMPORTANCE OF YOUR SUPPORTEEI is a small team with BIG ideas! To bring these big ideas to life we need your support. With you and the community backing us, we feel evermore empowered to create an extraordinary cultural experience that’s free and open to the public.While we have have set a goal of $10,000, this production will cost much more! We hope a mix of your backing, corporate sponsors, and EEI investment will help us pull it off! The more we raise through Indiegogo, the more grass roots this event will be.Here's the breakdown of our budget:One of our biggest expenses, but most exciting opportunities, is our Holiday Shop. The event’s holiday shop will showcase works by folk artists, highlight cottage industries, and local businesses dedicated to preserving and promoting the arts. The more we raise through our campaign, the more traditional artists and their art we can support!So, as we begin executing our plan, we ask for your support in delivering an event that is meaningful, creative and engaging. We believe together as a community we can build an experience and a following that transcends the event itself.OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPYou could be anywhere in the world and still participate in bringing the Festival of Lights to life. Even if you cannot physically attend the events or contribute, join us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and visit our event website to see how the event is unfolding. Please spread the word by sharing our campaign with your friends and family, neighbors, co-workers and others in your community… thank you! To learn more about EEI or connect with us as a partner, call us at 732-645-2274, email us at connect@enjoyexploreindia.com, or visit our company website. We love exchanging ideas and building cultural connections!FESTIVAL DATES AND LOCATIONS

story:
VizVac:

Combines flashlights and vacuums into one unique product that will enhance your visibility while cleaning in-between appliances, cabinets, baseboards, hardwood floors, carpet and workshop environments.

Benefits:

  • Adjusts to fit any flashlight  or vacuum size
  • Works on brooms, mops, and rakes
  • Helps to inspect painted surfaces
  • Allows you to change batteries
  • Made with ultra strong rubber coated webbing
  • Tighten using a simple buckle
  • Works on tapered tubes
  • Steam cleaner wands
  • Uprights and shop vacuums

AVAILABLE COLORS

How you can help:

Your contributions will help us purchase the webbing and industrial sewing machines.

 

Bridging industrial gaps:

Did you know the flashlight industry sells $1.5 billion annually?

Did you know there's $2.5 billion sold in vacuum cleaners each year?

How about the powder coating industry being worth $12 billion a year.

Seldom do we see a design that merges two products together and it's even more rare to see a design that bridges industries.  With your help, VizVac can tap into these other areas.  To give you some insight, powder coating is a huge industry because it's used to paint everything you see in your household.  From wrought iron chairs and railings for staircases, to all the appliances like refrigerators, washer and dryers, stove tops, sinks and even bicycles.

If you're a car, motorcycle or truck enthusiast, you know that powder coating is most often used for wheel rims, under carriages, break calipers, and many engine parts.  For the DIY car lover and small shops, VizVac will help painters inspect their powder coatings during the process and prior to oven curing.  It helps ensure that no surface goes unpainted.

 

RV's and Camping

Mini Van seats

Boats

Shop floors

Under furniture

Steam cleaners

story:
Introduction

Everyone knew us as Columbus Kombucha Company. In May 2016 we changed our name to Wild Ohio Brewing, under a new management and ownership. The employees and brewer are working with the new management team. We are now only brewing Luna Notti the High ABV Kombucha Inspired Ales.

Our Flavors

We will be focused on only making gluten free craft beer alternatives.

We will have 4 year round flavors – Blueberry Lavender (5% ABV), ginger (5% ABV), Black Cherry Bourbon (9.2% ABV) and our new Blood Orange Tangerine (5% ABV)

We have two hopped flavors – Mango and Black Raspberry both 7.8% ABV. Mango will be available in the spring and summer and Black raspberry in fall and winter.

We are introducing 2 new flavors next year – Mint Julep aged in bourbon barrels (7.8% ABV), Blueberry Hambella our collaboration with Café Brioso for a 6.5% beer with Hambella coffee, and Cranberry with 5% ABV. Mint Julep will be available Spring during racing season, Blueberry Hambella in summer and fall and Cranberry during the Holidays.

Why we need funding?

We are changing our packaging from a 4 pack to a 6-pack. This will bring you your same favorite beer at a lower price of $9.99 a 6-pack. We plan to saturate the state of Ohio at the cheaper price and make our gluten free beer more affordable. We are also reducing the pricing on our kegs so our beer will be cheaper in bars, and restaurants. We are dropping the price so our brews can be enjoyed by everyone. We will also increase our distribution in to the states of Kentucky and Michigan. The additional funding will be used for operating expenses

What You Get For Helping Us

We are giving you the equivalent or more dollar amount back in free product. Our supporters in Columbus can come pick it up and visit our brewery or we will deliver it. Outside of Columbus we will make arrangements to deliver it to your doorstep. A four pack cost $10 and if you give us $10 you get a 4 pack back in return. A case cost $60 If you give us $1000 we will give you 20 free cases over 5 months which is equivalent to $1200.

What will we use the funding for?

Design of 6-packs                            $1,000

Printing of 6-Packs                           $10,000

Kegs                                                      $14,200

Marketing – OH, KY and MI          $12,000

Operating Expenses                        $12,800

Total                                                      $50,000

The Impact of Your Contribution          

The Impact of your contribution will allow us to bring our beer to a lot more people, and allow us to grow more rapidly as we increase sales. Our product is important to our staff and customers, and is locally made by local people, and any help would be beneficial to not only this business, but our local economy.

If you cannot help us

If you cannot help us we still thank you and ask you to refer us to a friend and spread the word of our campaign through social media.

story:
Want to support minority and disadvantaged business but don't know how? Now it is easy. 

One of the foremost experts on minority business in the U.S. said:

"Hidden Star is a revolutionary approach; one of the best concepts I have seen in 50 years. I have been around disadvantaged and minority entrepreneurship my whole life; this is exactly the solution that is needed, and they do a great job. I have seen it work with my own eyes. They are very impressive and deserving of our support."

John S. Butler, Ph.D.
Distinguished Professor of Minority Entrepreneurship &
Award winning author

 

Finally, Hidden Star’s revolutionary new approach is helping reverse the terrible decline in business ownership and entrepreneurship among low-income, disadvantaged, and minorities in the U.S. We are not waiting on government to address income inequality; we are doing it right here, right now.

We are a group of experienced entrepreneurs and business owners who want to give back and help everyone succeed.  We know how the system works and we provide great, free help. By improving success and participation rates, we can help these under-privileged entrepreneurs change their lives and their family’s lives for generations.

We are already doing great work and getting great results. In fact, one of the ranking experts in the field, Dr. John S. Butler, said Hidden Star is one of the best concepts for minority entrepreneurship he has seen in 50 years! 

Please watch our video for details on how this works and the great work we are doing. 

The more donations we get from people like YOU, the more disadvantaged entrepreneurs we can help start a business, hire employees, and pay taxes. That benefits everyone!

PERKS!! There are great perks and rewards at various giving levels. You can get books, links, and GIFT CERTIFICATES to Infinite Clothing. They are a minority owned firm that Hidden Star has helped and they make great workout clothing from RECYCLED WATER BOTTLES! It is awesome. (Check out their website at www.infinite.clothing)

Hidden Star provides services that improve outcomes for low- income, disadvantaged, and minority entrepreneurs; and dramatically improves their odds of succeeding in their own business. These services include advice, consulting, guidance, education, and support across a wide range of necessary areas: structure, general business, legal, real estate, negotiating, governmental regulations, permits, researching the market, helping with business planning, accounting and others. These are precisely the services that have historically been out of reach for these entrepreneurs.

And we are very efficient. Government programs can spend more than $100,000 to create a single job. Hidden Star spends LESS THAN 1% OF THAT to help our entrepreneurs create a job. Amazing!  They can do it, they just need some help.

Our unique Pay It Forward With Equity twist means that this will become a self-sustaining fund providing more and more help to more and more deserving entrepreneurs. It is an awesome social good and very powerful. 

Please help us help them.

Whether you donate or not, PLEASE help us spread the word! Please share this link to your friends and contacts who might be interested in supporting disadvantaged and minority entrepreneurship. 

We are an IRS approved 501(c)(3) organization, so donations are tax deductible. 

We strictly follow the IRS financial, accountability and reporting  rules for such organizations, Donated funds go  to providing free services to low income, disadvantaged, and minority entrepreneurs.

story:
Vandana like many Indian housewives has always been cooking 3 meals a day for her family but she usually she does not get an opportunity to use these same skills to become financially independent.

Swapna has grown up in environments where there are several women like Vandana and ever since Swapna has always wanted to add value to the wonderful skills that these women posses. Now, she has finally quit her job at a MNC and has decided to leverage these experiences, a deep passion for food and her management education to open up a restaurant that is built on the  amazing culinary skills these women have.

The Location

Mangalore or as the local residents fondly call it, Kudla is a coastal city on the banks of Arabian Sea in India, it has rich varieties of foods deeply engraved in its culture, it is Swapna’s hometown.

About Swapna kunil

She is always amazed at the magic that happens when cuisine from different cultures come together, for instance, how Italian, Mexican or Mughlai flavours blend with her local ‘Kudla’ food. Hence she has decided to call her restaurant, ‘Fusion Kudla’,  where Kudla food blends with culinary styles from across the globe.

Swapna’s journey so far

  • Comes from a family passionate about food,whether it be cooking or serving .

  • A self-trained cook and Artist

  • An MBA

  • Her grandfather owned a restaurant  in Mangalore  in 1960’s

  • She is an artist & exhibited her paintings in Chitrakala parishath (Bangalore) & Durbar hall, Kochi, Kerala.

  • website:Kunil's Art 

  • Few of her paintings are in online gallery-Art square

The plan

It is not possible for most women in the Indian societies to work full time as they are also homemakers. However, the food they cook is no match for any restaurant or joint, the plan is to allow these women to work during hours of their choice and make additional income. This we believe will enhance their self-esteem and help make them financially independent.

Market Strategy

The location planned for the restaurant is in a vicinity buzzing with students, as most of them are staying away from home and already missing the magical touch that their moms have in their food, Fusion Kudla with your support will come to their rescue.  

Because we will provide excellent service, our primary marketing will come from word of mouth through our loyal customers. We also plan to be active on social media sites such as  Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Plans to notify local news channels  and also traditional advertising methods such as distributing coupons on campus and in surrounding businesses, along with sidewalk signage will also be utilized.

We will also do some sampling  & demos to create new food & give customer the opportunity to try our new food and experience our creativity.This will help build a word of mouth campaign ,which will be our most effective form of marketing strategy.

Ambience

We plan to provide a natural ambience with plenty of greenery and where people get a break from the city rush.

Why she needs your help?

The restaurant has to be started from scratch, and funds are needed for

This

And that

Financial Plan & budget

Estimated cost is 23 Lakh INR approximately (34544 USD as on Jun 6, 2016). Here’s a detailed break-up.


Partial FundingWhatever amount we are  able to get from your support, it shall be used towards acheiving the same goal, if it’s a 100 % funding than I see my dream restaurant coming up, if its little lesser, I will cut down my costs on furniture. If it’s 50%, I would have a much smaller space but the same ambition, with something like 25 %, I will still be able to open a food stall. If I get anything more than 100 %, the extra amount shall add to the size and look of the space.

Management

We have three hotel management graduates who have years of experience in the hotel industry.

Commitments:

Fusion Kudla is committed to provide opportunity to housewives, the local community & local farmers. We will also provide exhibition space for the local artists to showcase their work.

Project Progress

Our business plan, market research, competitive analysis, operating plan, marketing plan are in progress. We’re also working on various dishes that’ll be on our introductory menu.

Our website is up and running ,for more information please visit www.fusionkudla.in

Other ways you can help our Fusion Kudla

There are many ways you can help us with this campaign besides monetary funding.You can spread the word in your network, share us on e-mail , Instagram ,Face book, Twitter.Ask friends to support the project. Forward a link to this campaign to people you think might be interested. Anything you can do to help us reach a larger audience, including using the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you everyone that took time to read

Testimonial

Freeman Murray

  Co-Founder Jaaga

  President - Bangalore Chapter at Code For India

  Krishnan N

  Co-founder & Director at  Gai Technologies Pvt Ltd

 Testimonial Videos:

 Please Click here

story:
Short Summary

Isle of Reefs Tours (IORT) was founded based on my insight into the unique, natural experiences of Carriacou and the other Grenadine Islands. I recognized and embraced the need to promote a unique and environmentally friendly product and to secure the future of this sensitive environment for my two boys and future generations.

Isle of Reefs Tours currently offers boat tours, excursions to the Tobago Cays Marine Park, guided hiking, turtle watching, offshore camping, island tours, carbon offset and local cultural experiences.  Isle of Reefs Tours actively participates in the Grenada Bank Marine Protected Area Network which monitors and manages environmental issues in the Grenadines. We also work with school children to do beach clean ups and to teach about environmental protection as part of our social responsibility. 

What We Need

In response to growing demands from visitors, for the upcoming season, Isle of Reefs plans to expand its activities by commissioning a second, larger boat and by offering two additional tour products:

Second Boat: Isle of Reefs Tours has been very successful during its first two years of operation but its activities are now limited by the availability of boat transportation for the various trips that we offer; essentially IORT can only offer one trip per day because it has only one, relatively small boat, but the demand for trips is substantially greater than that. During the past year I had an opportunity to buy a 27 feet fiberglass boat hull at a good price and I used my total savings of US$17,000 to purchase it. The concept is to use the new boat with environmentally friendly engines for the longer trips to the Tobago Cays thereby utilizing my current boat for the shorter trips and the new activities that are outlined below.   In order to commission the second boat we need to have it refitted with two engines, safety equipment, electrical modifications and employ additional boat staff. These items represent the largest part of the cost of the expanded business.

Guided Kayaking Tours: This tour would offer a serene, meditation like experience into the Tyrell Bay Mangrove and Oyster Bed, an ecologically sensitive breeding ground for numerous land and marine species.  To successfully accomplish this goal we will employ a new tour guide and purchase kayaks and safety equipment.

Citizen Science Tours:  Guests on these tours would visit various bird watching locations on Carriacou and nearby islands, where they would have the opportunity to observe and record nesting and roosting colonies of resident and migratory seabirds.  This tour has the added benefit of the information collected being submitted to Birds Caribbean, to aid in the protection of these species by monitoring their health and status.  We will need to employ a guide and purchase monitoring equipment such as binoculars and bird identification charts to make this tour a reality.

Monetary commitment to successfully accomplish this expansion: This expansion of Isle of Reef Tours will cost US$47,000 including the US$17,000 that I have spent on the boat hull over the past year; so we need to raise a further $30,000. The costs breakdown for the $30,000 is shown in our financial explanation chart below.  Consequently, to fulfill our vision of fostering environmental awareness and protection while generating employment, we are seeking your assistance.

 

 

 

The Impact

Your contribution will assist us in accomplishing our goals and guarantee success. Most importantly, your vote of confidence, will allow us to provide four local job opportunities while teaching and maintaining respect for the environment. The addition of the new tour experiences will increase Carriacou's Tourist Experience, which provides much needed revenue for restaurants, accommodations, small businesses and taxis on the island.

Risks & Challenges

In the event that we are unable to achieve our fundraising goal, we will not be able to implement the envisioned tour packages for the upcoming tourist season, as the items listed above are invaluable for the operation of the planned tours. However, if we fall short of funds raised, we will proceed with the same dedication and vigor that we have built this business on. Funds raised by this campaign will be put towards securing as many of the required items as possible and we would work towards having these tours offered as soon as Isle of Reefs is able to cover the additional cash shortfall.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us by making a contribution to our campaign and by sharing our campaign with your family, friends and social network. We have put together a wonderful suite of perks to match your generous contribution as a means of showing our gratitude for your invaluable contribution including our platinum perk featuring a 7 days stay at Beach Garden Villa, Carriacou. 

 

Beach Garden Villa

Beach Garden Villa is a colorful two bedroom property nestled among palms and tropical gardens, on Carriacou's Paradise Beach.  The view from the veranda takes you out over the bay to small islets, reefs and the distant peaks of the Grenadine Islands.

 

 

Thank you for your consideration, your support will truly make a difference.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Isle of Reefs Tours (IORT) was founded based on my insight into the unique, natural experiences of Carriacou and the other Grenadine Islands. I recognized and embraced the need to promote a unique and environmentally friendly product and to secure the future of this sensitive environment for my two boys and future generations.
Isle of Reefs Tours currently offers boat tours, excursions to the Tobago Cays Marine Park, guided hiking, turtle watching, offshore camping, island tours, carbon offset and local cultural experiences.  Isle of Reefs Tours actively participates in the Grenada Bank Marine Protected Area Network which monitors and manages environmental issues in the Grenadines. We also work with school children to do beach clean ups and to teach about environmental protection as part of our social responsibility. 

What We Need
In response to growing demands from visitors, for the upcoming season, Isle of Reefs plans to expand its activities by commissioning a second, larger boat and by offering two additional tour products:
Second Boat: Isle of Reefs Tours has been very successful during its first two years of operation but its activities are now limited by the availability of boat transportation for the various trips that we offer; essentially IORT can only offer one trip per day because it has only one, relatively small boat, but the demand for trips is substantially greater than that. During the past year I had an opportunity to buy a 27 feet fiberglass boat hull at a good price and I used my total savings of US$17,000 to purchase it. The concept is to use the new boat with environmentally friendly engines for the longer trips to the Tobago Cays thereby utilizing my current boat for the shorter trips and the new activities that are outlined below.   In order to commission the second boat we need to have it refitted with two engines, safety equipment, electrical modifications and employ additional boat staff. These items represent the largest part of the cost of the expanded business.
Guided Kayaking Tours: This tour would offer a serene, meditation like experience into the Tyrell Bay Mangrove and Oyster Bed, an ecologically sensitive breeding ground for numerous land and marine species.  To successfully accomplish this goal we will employ a new tour guide and purchase kayaks and safety equipment.
Citizen Science Tours:  Guests on these tours would visit various bird watching locations on Carriacou and nearby islands, where they would have the opportunity to observe and record nesting and roosting colonies of resident and migratory seabirds.  This tour has the added benefit of the information collected being submitted to Birds Caribbean, to aid in the protection of these species by monitoring their health and status.  We will need to employ a guide and purchase monitoring equipment such as binoculars and bird identification charts to make this tour a reality.
Monetary commitment to successfully accomplish this expansion: This expansion of Isle of Reef Tours will cost US$47,000 including the US$17,000 that I have spent on the boat hull over the past year; so we need to raise a further $30,000. The costs breakdown for the $30,000 is shown in our financial explanation chart below.  Consequently, to fulfill our vision of fostering environmental awareness and protection while generating employment, we are seeking your assistance.
 


 
 
The Impact
Your contribution will assist us in accomplishing our goals and guarantee success. Most importantly, your vote of confidence, will allow us to provide four local job opportunities while teaching and maintaining respect for the environment. The addition of the new tour experiences will increase Carriacou's Tourist Experience, which provides much needed revenue for restaurants, accommodations, small businesses and taxis on the island.

Risks & Challenges
In the event that we are unable to achieve our fundraising goal, we will not be able to implement the envisioned tour packages for the upcoming tourist season, as the items listed above are invaluable for the operation of the planned tours. However, if we fall short of funds raised, we will proceed with the same dedication and vigor that we have built this business on. Funds raised by this campaign will be put towards securing as many of the required items as possible and we would work towards having these tours offered as soon as Isle of Reefs is able to cover the additional cash shortfall.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
You can help us by making a contribution to our campaign and by sharing our campaign with your family, friends and social network. We have put together a wonderful suite of perks to match your generous contribution as a means of showing our gratitude for your invaluable contribution including our platinum perk featuring a 7 days stay at Beach Garden Villa, Carriacou. 
 
Beach Garden Villa
Beach Garden Villa is a colorful two bedroom property nestled among palms and tropical gardens, on Carriacou's Paradise Beach.  The view from the veranda takes you out over the bay to small islets, reefs and the distant peaks of the Grenadine Islands.
 



 
Thank you for your consideration, your support will truly make a difference.

story:
Who we are :

  • Founded and owned by husband and wife team, John Brown and Stephanie Brenner-Brown.  John is a United States Air Force Veteran of 10 years and software developer of 25 years.  Stephanie has a history of legal and state regulatory work with Environment and Wildlife management and legislation.
  • We want to change the world.  We want to inspire people to give back in one of 3 ways : 

1. to humanitarian efforts, everything from curing diseases, homelessness, and veteran care, to inspiring people to engage in better health practices and nutritional care.

2. to the animals of our planet, whether local community rescue shelters, or to larger impact areas like wildlife protection of endangered species, whether land or sea.

3. to the environment.  Our world is suffering.  We need to protect everything from our national and international protected nature preserves and parks, to the lakes and rivers, mountains, plains, deserts, forests, jungles, rainforests, coral and barrier reefs, to our precious oceans.

The Impact :

We will be making a HUGE difference in the world.

  • Our company will affect FOUR different areas of importance in the world every year.
  • Each year we will be giving back to Humanitarian, Wildlife, and Environmental ecosystem based charitable organizations.
  • And every 3 months, we will be donating excess inventory and product to needy communities around the world.
  • Spreading a positive message and encouraging compassion and altruistic behavior in all those that we are able to reach.
  • Contributors will be providing the startup capital for product inventory, while our eventual regular customers will be helping us give money in each of the 3 ways listed, as we contribute 10% of annual net profits to an organization in each of these categories every year.  We will also be spreading an important message about the power of giving while increasing compassion for all living things and ecosystems throughout our world.  Annual charities will change regularly to spread greater impact.

What We Need & What You Get :

  • With new numerous designs planned for launch, we are looking for $65,000 to start.

 

  • Campaign contributors will have the option to receive any of the following, or a combination of items :
    • a personal hand-written thank you
    • a limited edition t-shirt
    • free lifetime discount
    • free lifetime shipping
    • free lifetime discount AND lifetime shipping
    • For artists, who want to design their own, we will offer them their own signature collection and profile on our website
    • And everyone who contributes will be PERMANENTLY immortalized on our website, thanking influencers and contributors who helped bring our vision to life.
  • Since this is a flex-funding campaign, in the event that the funding goal is not met, all contributions will be kept.  All items will still be awarded, and all items deemed for future production will just be produced in smaller startup quantities.  We benefit more from the ability to purchase large bulk amounts since this reduces cost per item.  All products will be purchased & printed from various wholesalers, and ship from Austin, Texas.  Shipping is expected to begin January of 2017.  Contributors who are due to receive lifetime coupon codes will receive their coupon via email.

Perks :

 

    ​When you've gone the furthest you can go ... GO FURTHER.

    • Everyone faces risks and challenges.  We are no different.  But through goals, passion, perseverance, and determination, we can ascend.  The risk we face is that our products - shirts, sweatshirts, hats, and accessories - are just like everyone else's.  Essentially made of the same materials, by the same companies.  But where we differ is our company vision -  A dream to create world impact.  A vision of empowering everyone to exercise compassion.  Inspiring everyone to LIVE BIG, GIVE  BIGGER.

    What We NEED from YOU ...

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help :

    • Contribute.  Every little bit helps!  For your part, one of our rewards is all yours!
    • Can't spare a little cash?  Hey, we totally understand.  Times get tough, and with everyone wanting a little help, it can get overwhelming ... so instead, we would be forever grateful if you could SPREAD THE WORD!  Use the options at the top of the page to share on Facebook and Twitter.  Shout it loud and proud.  Please invite your friends and family.  We can't do it without your help.  ( Well, we can, but it will be a lot more work! )
